StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTechTree_Name
StringTable.String: Terran Tech Tree

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTechTree_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A balanced tech tree.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTechTree_Dec
StringTable.String: A balanced tech tree.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranColonizationTech_Name
StringTable.String: Colonization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranColonizationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of colony modules and basic colony buildings.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranColonizationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: For generations mankind has dreamed of setting foot on other worlds. That dream is now a reality. Feet are being set on other worlds. We're setting lots of things on other worlds actually.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranXenoIndustrializationTech_Name
StringTable.String: Xeno Industrialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranXenoIndustrializationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved colony buildings.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranXenoIndustrializationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Everything is harder on the surface of an alien world, every machine we own having to be adjusted for the differences in gravity or atmosphere, all our old constants and empirical shortcuts having to be thrown out and re-written.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIndustrialSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Manufacturing Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIndustrialSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves manufacturing capacity.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIndustrialSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: There's no sense stopping at "basic competence" when it comes to making things in alien environments. We should probably learn from the many mistakes we're still making, for example, if only to improve our manufacturing capacity.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIndustrialSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Research Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIndustrialSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves research capacity.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIndustrialSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our rapidly expanding frontiers have made available thousands and thousands of new things to look at under a microscope. Expanding our research capabilities will allow our scientists to keep up.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIndustrialSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Industrial Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIndustrialSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of building manufacturing and research centers.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIndustrialSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Having found out what works and doesn't work on alien planets, we've been able to standardize and modularize our building construction practices a bit, which should reduce building costs across our civilization.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAdvancedConstruction_Name
StringTable.String: Advanced Construction

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAdvancedConstruction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced manufacturing facilities.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAdvancedConstruction_Dec
StringTable.String: Advances in material sciences has given us the tools to build bigger and bolder, to finally catch up with some of the wilder imaginings our architects have come up with.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranConstructionOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Optimized Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranConstructionOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves manufacturing capacity.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranConstructionOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Every time we ramp up the scale of our manufacturing, we also ramp up the scale of our mistakes. It takes time and effort to weed those out, but it needs to be done if we want to reach our true manufacturing potential.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranConstructionOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Efficient Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranConstructionOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces manufacturing cost.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranConstructionOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: We resisted letting the accountants into the manufacturing centers for a long time, because the work is dangerous and also because no-one likes them. But once they found a way to sneak in, they did admittedly find several ways to cut manufacturing costs.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranConstructionOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Sustainable Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranConstructionOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces maintenance costs of manufacturing plants.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranConstructionOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Factories and manufacturing plants generate a lot of toxic byproducts which are expensive to dispose of. By making our manufacturing processes even a bit less wasteful, we expect to see broad cost savings over the life of a plant.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranXenoManufacturingMethods_Name
StringTable.String: Precision Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranXenoManufacturingMethods_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic manufacturing facilities.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranXenoManufacturingMethods_Dec
StringTable.String: Some of our more precise manufacturing processes have resisted the move off-world; adapting them to a broad range of planetary and micro-gravitational environments is proving to be a surprisingly challenging endeavor. We think we've got it now, but nevertheless still recommend you invest in extended warranties.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranManufacturingFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Military Industry

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranManufacturingFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves military manufacturing capacity.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranManufacturingFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Tooling our manufacturing centers to specialize in military production sends a pretty unfriendly message to anyone paying close attention to us. But it should make everyone in adaptive camo fatigues happy.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranManufacturingFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Social Industry

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranManufacturingFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves civilian manufacturing capacity.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranManufacturingFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: One of the unforeseen side-effects of managing a civilization on this scale is finding things to do with all these people. Keeping them happy is as important as keeping them safe, and they can sometimes be pretty difficult about it.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranManufacturingFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Competitive Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranManufacturingFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces manufacturing costs.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranManufacturingFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: We thought we cleared them out after the last time, but some more accountants managed to slip in to our manufacturing centers. Or they're living in the walls now. Regardless, they've found some more ways for us to reduce our manufacturing overhead.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIndustrialExpertise_Name
StringTable.String: Industrial Expertise

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIndustrialExpertise_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate manufacturing facilities.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIndustrialExpertise_Dec
StringTable.String: By manipulating materials at the atomic level, we can now construct things of unparalleled precision. This has massively expanded our industrial capacity, along with creating an entirely new class of pretty terrifying workplace safety issues.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIndustrialMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Master Military Assembly

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIndustrialMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves military manufacturing capacity.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIndustrialMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: We're slowly eking out the last possible efficiencies in our military manufacturing processes, our civilization slowly turning into a war machine itself.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIndustrialMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: Social Construction Mastery

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIndustrialMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves social manufacturing capacity.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIndustrialMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Few of our civilians seem to realize the challenge of constructing the farms, hospitals, and entertainment complexes that they rely on to survive. And yet every time we try to tell them, they just yawn and walk away.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPracticalFusion_Name
StringTable.String: Practical Fusion

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPracticalFusion_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved power plants.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPracticalFusion_Dec
StringTable.String: Making cascading fusion reactors robust, tamper-resistant, and generally catastrophe-proof has taken a lot of work. But now that we have, we expect to see improved manufacturing capacity and only the bare minimum of catastrophes.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranQuantumPower_Name
StringTable.String: Quantum Power

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranQuantumPower_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic power plants.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranQuantumPower_Dec
StringTable.String: By tapping into the quantum zero point energy of a vacuum, our physicists claim that we now have access to a massive source of power. It's not infinite, but boy is there ever a lot of it.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInstitutionalResearch_Name
StringTable.String: Institutional Research

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInstitutionalResearch_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved research facilities.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInstitutionalResearch_Dec
StringTable.String: We're at our best when we're not just living in this universe, but observing it. Figuring it out. Sometimes dismantling small parts of it. By setting up special places for that to happen, we expect research breakthroughs to occur much more frequently.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranResearchOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Optimized Research

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranResearchOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases research capacity.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranResearchOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: We've improved and made more efficient many of our research practices which should lead to faster research, or at the very least, less researchers complaining about red tape.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranResearchOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Research Cost Reduction

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranResearchOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the manufacturing cost of research improvements.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranResearchOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: In the rush to begin processing and analyzing all the new data our rapid expansion has provided, a number of horribly wasteful research practices became commonplace. By eliminating those we should be able to make our research quite a bit cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranResearchOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Sustainable Research

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranResearchOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces maintenance costs of research improvements.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranResearchOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Research labs are full of expensive toys which are in a near constant state of breaking down. By considering how to do some of this more sustainably, we expect to see broad cost savings over the life of a lab.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranResearchCenters_Name
StringTable.String: Research Centers

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranResearchCenters_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced research facilities.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranResearchCenters_Dec
StringTable.String: By putting all of our smartest people and their favorite toys into the same building, we expect to see significant improvements in our ability to research new fields. Also, we'll give them food so they have no reason to leave.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTechnologicalFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Focused Research

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTechnologicalFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Research capacity.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTechnologicalFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: By focusing our efforts on pure research we have been able to get a significant improvement on the rate of new discoveries.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTechnologicalFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Research Production Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTechnologicalFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of research improvements.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTechnologicalFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: By focusing our efforts on our research infrastructure we have been able to cut down the cost of building new facilities.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTechnologicalFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Research Economics

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTechnologicalFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces maintenance of research improvements.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTechnologicalFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: By focusing how our researchers work and eliminating some of the more wasteful experiments, we have been able to significantly reduce the maintenance of our research facilities.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIntegratedResearch_Name
StringTable.String: Integrated Research

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIntegratedResearch_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic research facilities.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIntegratedResearch_Dec
StringTable.String: We've made great strides in our understanding of the universe, and now require larger academies to facilitate the multi-disciplinary studies needed to push back the veil further. The researchers are also demanding something called a "faculty bar."

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranResearchMatrixTech_Name
StringTable.String: Research Matrix

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranResearchMatrixTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate research facilities.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranResearchMatrixTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Imagine millions of scientists, working in a city-sized research facility, with none of the distractions of the outside world like weather or basic social contact. Yes, some will turn into psychopaths. But we were planning to keep an eye on them anyways.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDeeperKnowledge_Name
StringTable.String: Deeper Knowledge

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDeeperKnowledge_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of deep research facilities.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDeeperKnowledge_Dec
StringTable.String: Our understanding of the universe has grown by leaps and bounds. Teams who have made an effort to slow down and consider some of the implications of these discoveries are now revealing deeper patterns in the fabric of reality.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranQuantumUnderstanding_Name
StringTable.String: Quantum Understanding

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranQuantumUnderstanding_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved deep research facilities.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranQuantumUnderstanding_Dec
StringTable.String: Our latest facilities are no longer groping blindly at the edge of the sub-atomic world. For one thing there are twenty edges, and they're less edges than toroid's, and there are actually now zero of them. It turns out reality is super complicated.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBeyondMortality_Name
StringTable.String: Beyond Mortality

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBeyondMortality_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced deep research facilities. Prepares civilization for Ascension.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBeyondMortality_Dec
StringTable.String: Ascension will make us immortal, and usher us into a reality that is beyond this one. What lies there remains a mystery, but we've never backed away from those before.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranResearchCoordination_Name
StringTable.String: Research Coordination

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranResearchCoordination_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of research support facilities.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranResearchCoordination_Dec
StringTable.String: Coordinating research has only gotten more challenging as our civilization has grown. Research Coordination Centers should help ease that challenge, minimizing any duplication of effort, and improve the productivity of neighboring research facilities

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranNeroLinking_Name
StringTable.String: Neuro Linking

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranNeroLinking_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved research support facilities.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranNeroLinking_Dec
StringTable.String: The benefits of direct brain-to-brain communication will be felt in a wide variety of fields, but considering how socially awkward many of our researchers are, we suspect they'll profit the most from living in a world without small talk.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPlanetaryImprovement_Name
StringTable.String: Planetary Improvement

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPlanetaryImprovement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of civilian buildings. Increases population growth.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPlanetaryImprovement_Dec
StringTable.String: Half the fun of moving to a new place is fixing it up to suit your needs. That's harder when the new place is an entire alien planet, but we're finally developing the tools and techniques to do just that.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPlanetarySpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Soil Enhancement

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPlanetarySpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases food production.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPlanetarySpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our farming technology has improved dramatically, and we're beginning to see enhanced crop yields as a result. The carrots still have that weird taste, but we're working on it.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPlanetarySpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Accelerated Growth

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPlanetarySpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases population growth.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPlanetarySpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we're able to modulate the effects an alien world has on fertility, our population growth rates are beginning to trend upwards. More babies for now, but more workers soon enough.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPlanetarySpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Enhanced Production

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPlanetarySpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases production.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPlanetarySpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: We're no longer just surviving on new worlds, but thriving there. Thanks to improved nutrient yields and preservation techniques, our workers can work longer and harder, improving the production capacity of our entire civilization.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranXenoAgriculturalAdaptation_Name
StringTable.String: Agricultural Adaptation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranXenoAgriculturalAdaptation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved farms. Increases food production.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranXenoAgriculturalAdaptation_Dec
StringTable.String: Adapting our agricultural expertise to fit a variety of alien environments has proven challenging, and taken many simultaneous advances in our understanding of soil, atmospheric science, and shovels. That's right. On some planets, we need special shovels.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAgriculturalOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Accelerated Agriculture

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAgriculturalOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases food production.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAgriculturalOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Adapting our planting, feeding, and harvesting regimens to account for differences in the seasons of alien worlds takes a lot of effort and has to be fine tuned on every planet. But now that we're able to do it, we expect to see greater food yields.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAgriculturalOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Efficient Agriculture

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAgriculturalOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of farms.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAgriculturalOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we have more experience growing food on alien worlds, our agricultural engineers are able to predict in advance what farming equipment a colony will need before it's formed, leading to lower startup costs.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAgriculturalOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Sustainable Agriculture

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAgriculturalOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces maintenance cost of farms.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAgriculturalOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: By taking a step back from the cutting edge of agricultural science, and using older, more reliable equipment, we can reduce the costs of running most of our farms.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIntensiveFarming_Name
StringTable.String: Intensive Farming

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIntensiveFarming_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced farms.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIntensiveFarming_Dec
StringTable.String: Maximizing the food production of a given plot of soil is an expensive but very necessary step for those worlds where arable land comes at a premium.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranFarmingFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Nutritional Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranFarmingFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases food production.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranFarmingFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: The microbes present in alien soil react differently to nutrients than we're used to, and it's taken awhile to fine tune our fertilization techniques to keep our own plants fed. But now that we have, we expect to see even greater food production.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranFarmingFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Farm Adaptability Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranFarmingFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of farms.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranFarmingFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: We've finally homed in on the species and strains of plants which adapt to the widest range of environments. By focusing our production efforts on these crops, the startup costs for any farm should now be much more manageable.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranFarmingFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Farm Management Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranFarmingFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces maintenance costs of farms.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranFarmingFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Farmers throughout our civilization are tackling unique agricultural challenges every day. By implementing civilization-wide information sharing systems, we can spread our best practices further, reducing farming operational costs everywhere.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLosslessFarming_Name
StringTable.String: Lossless Farming

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLosslessFarming_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic farms.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLosslessFarming_Dec
StringTable.String: Improvements in our recycling and nutrient delivery systems have led to almost perfectly efficient farms. Our farmers don't even need to get their hands dirty now, and are actually getting a bit precious about it.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAgriculturalMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Master Farmers

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAgriculturalMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases food production.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAgriculturalMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our food production capacity has taken another step forward. Also, we finally gotten that weird taste out of the carrots, but it turns out that everyone now likes it, so we had to put it back.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAgriculturalMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: Abundance

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAgriculturalMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Farms increase population growth.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAgriculturalMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: We have such an excessive quantity of food now that many of our people have taken it almost as a challenge to create families capable of consuming it all.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranFoodDistributionTech_Name
StringTable.String: Food Distribution

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranFoodDistributionTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of farming support buildings. Increases food production.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranFoodDistributionTech_Dec
StringTable.String: It sounds boring, and it is also actually boring, but thanks to advances in Xeno-accounting and the resulting improvement in the logistics of our food distribution system, we're now saving a lot of food which had previously gone to waste.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranXenoIrrigation_Name
StringTable.String: Xeno Irrigation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranXenoIrrigation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved farming support buildings. Increases food production.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranXenoIrrigation_Dec
StringTable.String: There are a number of surprising challenges when irrigating an alien planet, due to the incredible range of gravitational, soil, and atmosphere conditions we encounter. Also, the water is in many cases hiding.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBiomassResequencing_Name
StringTable.String: Biomass Resequencing

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBiomassResequencing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced farming support buildings. Increases food production.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBiomassResequencing_Dec
StringTable.String: Fundamentally, food is little more than long chains of carbon arranged into molecules that we find digestible and tasty. Plants and animals have done a fine job of sequencing these chains to date, but isn't it time we maybe let a robot take a crack at it?

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranXenoBiology_Name
StringTable.String: Xeno Biology

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranXenoBiology_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved medical facilities. Increases population growth.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranXenoBiology_Dec
StringTable.String: Understanding how human beings adapt to the microbiological environment of alien worlds will be critical to our chances of survival when colonizing the stars. Losing a colony to catastrophic diarrhea simply isn't an option.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPopulationEnhancement_Name
StringTable.String: Population Enhancement

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPopulationEnhancement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced medical facilities. Increases population growth.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPopulationEnhancement_Dec
StringTable.String: It takes a lot of the romance out of it, but for our colonies to succeed, they need babies, and they need them quickly. Dedicating more resources towards fertility enhancement and mood music should help.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBioReplication_Name
StringTable.String: Bio Replication

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBioReplication_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic medical facilities. Increases population growth.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBioReplication_Dec
StringTable.String: Once we took all of the fun parts out of reproduction, we were able to dramatically increase our growth rates. Sure, bio-replication might be ushering us into a nightmarish world of conformism and fewer available parking spaces. But we'll manage somehow.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEnvironmentalEngineering_Name
StringTable.String: Environmental Engineering

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEnvironmentalEngineering_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows soil enhancement and improves adjacency terrain effects.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEnvironmentalEngineering_Dec
StringTable.String: Our ability to improve and enhance the environment we work in will provide benefits to almost every aspect of colonization, and make walks in the outdoors a little less deadly.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEnvironmentOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Environmental Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEnvironmentOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases manufacturing adjacency terrain effects.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEnvironmentOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: By tweaking our environmental modifications to accommodate the high-energy and resource demands of the manufacturing sector, we expect to see improved production. And less environment.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEnvironmentOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Environmental Research

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEnvironmentOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases research adjacency terrain effects.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEnvironmentOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our researchers have a variety of environmental needs, from supplies of clean air and water, to high quality land for research farms. By accommodating them, we can expect to see faster and more efficient research.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEnvironmentOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Environmental Economics

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEnvironmentOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases economic adjacency terrain effects.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEnvironmentOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Representatives of private business continually ask us for clear, flat land, rid of all those awful alien plants and rocks. If we give it to them, we'll both get them off our backs and boost the local economy.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranExtremeWorldColonization_Name
StringTable.String: Extreme Colonization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranExtremeWorldColonization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows settlement on Extreme worlds, at reduced production potential.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranExtremeWorldColonization_Dec
StringTable.String: No longer are we limited to the low-hanging fruit of the galaxy's stock of planets. It won't be an easy life for anyone living on these new worlds, but it will be a life.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranColonizationFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Aquatic World Mastery

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranColonizationFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Normalizes production of Aquatic worlds, and boosts their wealth and tourism.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranColonizationFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our experience dealing with the challenges of life on Aquatic worlds has allowed us to make living there almost as comfortable as anywhere else in our civilization. Bathing caps are no longer mandatory.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranColonizationFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Frozen World Mastery

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranColonizationFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Normalizes production of Frozen worlds, and boosts their research and influence.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranColonizationFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: We're now so good at living on snowball worlds that many colonists go days at a time without using mittens, something which would have been considered wildly reckless even a few years ago.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranColonizationFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Barren World Mastery

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranColonizationFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Normalizes production of Barren worlds, and boosts their manufacturing and military.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranColonizationFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: It took some expensive, massively invasive water recycling technology to do it, but life on Barren worlds is now more or less as productive as anywhere else. The catheters are now much more comfortable too.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAtmosphericCleansing_Name
StringTable.String: Atmospheric Cleansing

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAtmosphericCleansing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows settlement on Radioactive and Toxic worlds, at reduced production potential.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAtmosphericCleansing_Dec
StringTable.String: Even the foulest and most toxic planetary environments can now be colonized by us. Good luck to the poor bastards who go for it, but at least they'll now have a fighting chance.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBiospherePerfection1_Name
StringTable.String: Radioactive World Mastery

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBiospherePerfection1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Normalizes production of Radioactive worlds and boosts their manufacturing output.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBiospherePerfection1_Dec
StringTable.String: The mutations and genetic defects which were a fact of life for the early colonists of Radioactive worlds are now a thing of the past. Any further mutations are now for cosmetic purposes only.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBiospherePerfection2_Name
StringTable.String: Toxic World Mastery

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBiospherePerfection2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Normalizes production of Toxic worlds and boosts their research output.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBiospherePerfection2_Dec
StringTable.String: We have mastered the challenges of living on even the most poisonous of planets. You still won't want to go outside without your helmet, but we've moved most of the places worth going inside anyways.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTerraformingTech_Name
StringTable.String: Terraforming

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTerraformingTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of Terraforming Plants.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTerraformingTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Terraforming is a tricky business, delicately poised between making a world more habitable for us without destroying its entire biosphere to do so. And there aren't any do-overs.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHabitatImprovement_Name
StringTable.String: Habitat Improvement

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHabitatImprovement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of Advanced Terraforming Plants.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHabitatImprovement_Dec
StringTable.String: Our ability to manipulate the biosphere has improved to the point that we can treat entire continents as a canvas. Will we paint a portrait of a thriving and prosperous civilization? Or the equivalent of writing our names in the snow in urine?

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSoilReclamation_Name
StringTable.String: Soil Reclamation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSoilReclamation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the use of almost useless terrain.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSoilReclamation_Dec
StringTable.String: Many planets do a very poor job of making terrain usable for colonial purposes. Where nature has dropped the ball, we've stepped in, and are now capable of developing what were once very marginal locations.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEnvironmentalResequencing_Name
StringTable.String: Environmental Resequencing

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEnvironmentalResequencing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the amount of usable land on all colonized planets.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEnvironmentalResequencing_Dec
StringTable.String: We're playing with powerful forces now, capable of manipulating planetary terrain on a scale never seen before. We must be sure to use this power wisely, or at least not actively for evil.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEngineeringTech_Name
StringTable.String: Engineering

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEngineeringTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of Hyperdrives and Tiny hulls.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEngineeringTech_Dec
StringTable.String: For generations, we've looked up at the stars and wondered, "What if?" Well buckle up, because "if" has happened. By bending space around our ships they're able to use conventional propulsion within a pocket of normal space, while accelerating at vastly greater speeds in reality. The stars have gotten closer.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInterstellarTravel_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Travel

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInterstellarTravel_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves sensor, life support, and speed of all ships.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInterstellarTravel_Dec
StringTable.String: Even at the incredible speeds we can travel at now, if we want to journey anywhere beyond the closest stars, we'll need to make significant improvements to our navigational and life support systems. More refined Hyperdrives wouldn't hurt either.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInterstellarSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Hyperdrive Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInterstellarSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the speed of all ships.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInterstellarSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: After analyzing how our first generation of Hyperdrives have (and haven't) worked, we've come up with a number of ways to improve our ships' speeds.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInterstellarSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Transportation Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInterstellarSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of Colony & Constructor modules.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInterstellarSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Pushing large support modules through space is inherently wasteful. By miniaturizing and optimizing the larger components, we can fit more on a ship, allowing them to go farther and faster than ever.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInterstellarSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Advanced Recirculation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInterstellarSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the range of all ships.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInterstellarSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: After listening to the complaints and coughs of our returning crews, we've improved the life support recirculation systems of our ships, which should marginally increase their effective range.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIonDriveTech_Name
StringTable.String: Ion Drive

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIonDriveTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of Improved Hyperdrives.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIonDriveTech_Dec
StringTable.String: By using magnetic fields to capture ions from the interstellar medium during Hyperdrive flight, we can funnel this additional mass into the exhaust of our engines, increasing our overall speed. Called Ion Drives, they make us go faster, basically.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIonOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: High Output Drives

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIonOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the speed of all ships.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIonOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: The ion capture technology of our Ion Drives requires a fiendish amount of tuning, which our ship's engineers are only just learning to automate. Once this work is done, we should see slightly higher speeds across our fleet.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIonOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Drive Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIonOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of drives.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIonOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Hyperfield generators are no longer the rare pieces of equipment they once were, and we're beginning to see efficiencies of scale that have reduced the unit-cost for each one.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIonOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Drive Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIonOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of drives.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIonOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Every year our Hyperdrives get more efficient and smaller. Less room for the engines means more room for everything else, benefiting every type of ship we could conceive of.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWarpFieldTheory_Name
StringTable.String: Warp Field Theory

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWarpFieldTheory_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of Advanced Hyperdrives.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWarpFieldTheory_Dec
StringTable.String: Our researchers are now able to "stack" up the space-bending fields of our Hyperdrives, magnifying the acceleration effect. They call these stacked fields "Warp Fields" and are able to use them to create vastly more powerful engines.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWarpFieldFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Warp Field Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWarpFieldFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the speed of all ships.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWarpFieldFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: By tuning the arrangement of stacked hyperfields in a variety of dimensions, we've found some surprisingly cheap ways to improve the speed of our Warp Drives.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWarpFieldFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Field Generator Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWarpFieldFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of drives.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWarpFieldFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we're using stacked fields and multi-field generators, even the most miniscule improvement in cost-efficiency can lead to significant savings.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWarpFieldFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Field Generator Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWarpFieldFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of drives.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWarpFieldFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: With a bit of experience working with the effects of stacked hyperfields, we've determined that we were stacking them inefficiently. Smaller field generators can achieve the same effects as their fatter predecessors.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHyperwarpWaves_Name
StringTable.String: Hyperwarp Waves

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHyperwarpWaves_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of Exotic Hyperdrives.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHyperwarpWaves_Dec
StringTable.String: A hyperwarp wave creates a cascading series of warp fields at a distance in front of the vessel, allowing the warp drive to effectively compress already compressed space. That glosses over a number of complicated mathematical issues which had to be sorted out to make it work, but our researchers now believe we can begin developing even faster drives.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHyperwarpMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Master Drive Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHyperwarpMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of drives.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHyperwarpMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: No other civilization in the galaxy can match ours for the ease and efficiency with which we build our drives. And still human ingenuity can find ways to make them cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHyperwarpMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: Drive Mass Reduction

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHyperwarpMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of drives.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHyperwarpMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: We have all but mastered hyperfield technology, and are capable of wringing the best possible speed from even the smallest engines.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranStellarFoldingTech_Name
StringTable.String: Stellar Folding

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranStellarFoldingTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Ultimate Hyperdrives.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranStellarFoldingTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Stellar folding bends space on a scale never seen before, hyperfields approaching the diameter of a star. Our ships are now the fastest in the galaxy, and perhaps the fastest the galaxy has ever seen.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHyperfieldProjection_Name
StringTable.String: Hyperfield Projection

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHyperfieldProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of speed boosting support modules.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHyperfieldProjection_Dec
StringTable.String: Careful analysis of the way hyperfield waves interact when ships are traveling in formation has revealed the possibility of building larger field generators capable of increasing the drive efficiency of an entire fleet.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranGravityFieldManipulation_Name
StringTable.String: Gravity Field Manipulation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranGravityFieldManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced speed boosting support modules.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranGravityFieldManipulation_Dec
StringTable.String: It took a long time to finally find the graviton. It turned out to be inside us the whole time. But now we can use it to generate massive artificial gravity fields, which should improve the maneuverability and tactical options of our ships in combat.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHyperfieldDisruption_Name
StringTable.String: Hyperfield Disruption

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHyperfieldDisruption_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of enemy speed reduction modules.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHyperfieldDisruption_Dec
StringTable.String: By analyzing the interference effects of multiple hyperwave fields from different ships traveling in close proximity, and combining that with our ability to generate hyperfield effects at ever increasing ranges, we can now limit the speed of enemy ships within the range of a properly equipped starbase.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranStellarFieldProjection_Name
StringTable.String: Stellar Field Projection

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranStellarFieldProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced speed boosting support modules.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranStellarFieldProjection_Dec
StringTable.String: The Stellar Field Projector allows properly equipped ships to effectively "tow" ships with less capable drives. The same technology will help us improve the hyperfield enhancing capabilities of our starbases.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInterstellarSurvey_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Survey

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInterstellarSurvey_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved sensors and survey modules.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInterstellarSurvey_Dec
StringTable.String: "Look before you leap," is excellent advice in all sorts of aspects of life and galactic civilization building. Now we finally have the sensor and survey tools for our ships to do just that.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSensorOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Sensor Amplification

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSensorOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases sensor range.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSensorOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: The latest generation of Nano-processors allow us to more rapidly process the massive volumes of information our sensors return, improving the overall effectiveness of our sensor systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSensorOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Sensors Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSensorOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of sensors.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSensorOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: The hyperfield detectors which our sensors use were originally cobbled together from leftover drives. Now that we have dedicated sensor manufacturing equipment, we can expect to see some significant cost savings.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSensorOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Sensor Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSensorOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of sensors.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSensorOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Our earliest sensors were crude, jury-rigged things. If we begin swapping out their parts for dedicated sensor-specific equipment, we should see significant weight savings.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEnergyFieldSensors_Name
StringTable.String: Energy Field Sensors

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEnergyFieldSensors_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced sensors.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEnergyFieldSensors_Dec
StringTable.String: We've long been able to detect the fields which all ships emit to control their Hyperdrives. Improvements in our understanding of the effects of space folding have revealed that those fields are detectable at much greater distances than previously believed.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEnergyFieldFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Sensor Field Augmentation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEnergyFieldFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases sensor range.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEnergyFieldFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our technicians have found that by turning one of the knobs up, our sensor systems can see a bit further. We feel kind of dumb for not realizing this before.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEnergyFieldFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Sensor Efficacy Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEnergyFieldFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of sensors.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEnergyFieldFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our sensor systems had several redundant parts, which when stripped out has led to the production of cheaper, more efficient systems. The accountants are all very excited.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEnergyFieldFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: High Density Sensors

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEnergyFieldFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of sensors.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEnergyFieldFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: The creation of high-density field detection components should lead to more compact sensors, leaving our ship designers more room to install guns. Everyone wins. Except the people the guns are pointed at.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSubspaceSensors_Name
StringTable.String: Subspace Sensors

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSubspaceSensors_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic sensors.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSubspaceSensors_Dec
StringTable.String: Subspace is the 12-dimension space that lies at right angles to and a little bit behind our universe, and it took us a very long time to figure out how to look at it. The upshot is that we can now build a new generation of very powerful sensors.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSensorMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Sensor Simplification

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSensorMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of sensors.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSensorMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: When a ragtag group of science-accountants teamed up with the goal of identifying cost savings in our most advanced sensor systems, few believed they had a chance. Many openly mocked them. Some people spit on them. But somehow they managed it.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSensorMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: Sensor Mass Reduction

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSensorMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of sensors.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSensorMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: A careful analysis of our newest sensor systems has revealed that several of their components don't technically have to exist in this universe. By shifting their workload into another plane, we can reduce the amount of mass we have to lug around in ours.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTargetingAssistTech_Name
StringTable.String: Targeting Assist

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTargetingAssistTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of targeting and stealth modules.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTargetingAssistTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Study of how our ships have performed (and occasionally underperformed) in combat have led to a number of improvements in our tactical targeting systems. At the same time, we've devised a system which should confuse enemy sensors, for even greater tactical benefit.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTargetingSupport_Name
StringTable.String: Targeting Support

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTargetingSupport_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of targeting and jamming modules.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTargetingSupport_Dec
StringTable.String: We've adapted our tactical sensor improvements into support modules, capable of allowing a single ship to provide sensor accuracy and jamming benefits to an entire fleet of vessels.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranXenoArcheology_Name
StringTable.String: Xeno Archeology

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranXenoArcheology_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research and begins the path towards Ascension.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranXenoArcheology_Dec
StringTable.String: For some time we've known of a race, or races, of long dead aliens called the Precursors. It's taken some time to adapt our survey systems to identify their relics, but now that we have, we hope to learn a few of their secrets.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPrecursorStudies_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Studies

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPrecursorStudies_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research and Ascension crystal mining.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPrecursorStudies_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we've had an opportunity to study a few Precursor relics, we've been able to detect patterns in them which have allowed us to build a framework which should greatly aid future Precursor research efforts.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPrecursorRelicFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Technologist

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPrecursorRelicFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor relic research benefits.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPrecursorRelicFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Understanding Precursor artifacts involves throwing out many of our pre-conceived notions about technology. Their interfaces don't just assume we have different anatomy; they assume we have different ways of thinking entirely.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPrecursorRelicFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Cultural Studies

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPrecursorRelicFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor relic cultural benefits.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPrecursorRelicFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: The public seems fascinated by the very idea of the Precursors, and the few relics that we've found have had a surprising range of effects on our society. If we desire, we can begin trying to capitalize on these cultural benefits: Precursor souvenirs. Wacky Precursor catchphrases. Things like that.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPrecursorRelicFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Capitalization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPrecursorRelicFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor relic economic benefits.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPrecursorRelicFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Most of the Precursor relics we find are a mystery to us, doing little more than generating patterns of pretty lights. Though it turns out there is a massive consumer market for pretty lights which we might want to capitalize on.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPrecursorExploitation_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Exploitation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPrecursorExploitation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research and Ascension crystal mining.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPrecursorExploitation_Dec
StringTable.String: The study of Precursor relics requires very specialized equipment. The construction of dedicated facilities staffed with Precursor specialists will allow us to make the most of these incredible artifacts.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPrecursorEngineering_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Engineering

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPrecursorEngineering_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research and Ascension crystal mining.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPrecursorEngineering_Dec
StringTable.String: We're now able to try recreating some of the Precursor's technology. Extremely advanced fabrication equipment will be needed to continue this work, but the benefits to our other research programs could be immeasurable.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPrecursorUnderstanding_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Understanding

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPrecursorUnderstanding_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research. Prepares civilization for Ascension.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPrecursorUnderstanding_Dec
StringTable.String: Precursor relics reveal their secrets to us with ease now, and we're close to building our own relics ourselves. We have almost as full an understanding of Precursor technology as the Precursors did themselves.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLifeSupport_Name
StringTable.String: Life Support

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLifeSupport_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved life support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLifeSupport_Dec
StringTable.String: It seems surprising that the factor limiting the travel range for our ships is its life support system, but there you have it. For anything less than a colony ship, keeping the occupants alive is now a bigger challenge than keeping the engines fueled.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLifeSupportOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Improved Life Support

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLifeSupportOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases ship range.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLifeSupportOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our experience with the rigors of space travel, and the shrieked radio transmissions of the few who fell to the rigors of space travel, have revealed a number of small improvements we might be able to make to our existing life support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLifeSupportOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Life Support Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLifeSupportOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces life support cost.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLifeSupportOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Reducing the cost of building life support systems is one of those things we often have to do that we don't want to advertise too much. It's hard enough finding naval recruits as it is.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLifeSupportOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Life Support Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLifeSupportOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces life support mass.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLifeSupportOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: By minimizing the amount of weight and space our life support systems take up, we leave more room for our life reduction systems, which is what we're now calling guns.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSupportFieldGeneration_Name
StringTable.String: Support Field Generation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSupportFieldGeneration_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced life support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSupportFieldGeneration_Dec
StringTable.String: Our growing familiarity with force fields has enabled us to replace our mechanical life support systems with more elegant field based processors. Food is now stored in a single block of nutrient-rich sludge, piped directly into the user's mouth.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSupportFieldFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Support Range Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSupportFieldFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases ship range.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSupportFieldFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: By aerating the nutrient sludge we provide our crews it takes up significantly more volume in their stomachs, making them feel full with less food. There are some associated problems with, uh, gas, but we're coming up with special filters to address that.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSupportFieldFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Support Manufacturing Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSupportFieldFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces life support cost.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSupportFieldFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our life support systems are now really, really cheap. Still effective though, let's not forget that. Maybe let's not even call them cheap. "Economical," or "Value," maybe.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSupportFieldFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Low Mass Support Systems

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSupportFieldFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces life support mass.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSupportFieldFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: By using the latest generation of efficient field generators, and also putting our crews on a diet, we've been able to reduce the mass of our life support systems even more.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPromethionSupportSystems_Name
StringTable.String: Promethion Support Systems

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPromethionSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic life support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPromethionSupportSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: The Promethion Support System extends our field life support further, with all the requirements for a living organism - oxygen, water, and food - now piped directly into that organism rather than left to float around and get on the equipment.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLifeSupportMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Support System Assembly

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLifeSupportMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces life support cost.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLifeSupportMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Some of the crews are finding out how little we're spending on their life support systems. "Do you think we're worthless?" they shout. And we don't, we really don't. They're not worthless at all! Worth less, yes. But that's different.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLifeSupportMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: Support Mass Reduction

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLifeSupportMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces life support mass.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLifeSupportMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our nutrient sludge now delivers itself to the crew using embedded Promethion field effectors, saving us the weight of carrying around heavy fixed effectors. The embedded effectors come out in the waste stream, ready for reuse. After cleaning, of course.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLosslessSupportSystems_Name
StringTable.String: Lossless Support Systems

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLosslessSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate life support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLosslessSupportSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: Our life support systems are now close to perfect, wasting no resources whatsoever and recycling essentially all waste products. As an added bonus, the fields have been reduced in size and are now much less humiliating for the crew.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSupportFieldMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Support Field Mastery

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSupportFieldMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of fleet life support modules.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSupportFieldMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our switch to field-based life support systems has made it possible to offload some materials to other vessels. Additionally, it should now be possible to supplement fleets via unmanned supply probes launched from an appropriately equipped facility.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranExplorationExtention_Name
StringTable.String: Exploration Extension

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranExplorationExtention_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced fleet life support modules.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranExplorationExtention_Dec
StringTable.String: We've adapted the latest in Promethion support field technology to be used by our fleet-support vessels, thus increasing an entire fleet's travel range. Additionally, we've made significant improvements to our starbase life support extension modules.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranOrbitalManufacturing_Name
StringTable.String: Orbital Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranOrbitalManufacturing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved manufacturing buildings and Small hulls.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranOrbitalManufacturing_Dec
StringTable.String: Moving our ship construction operations to micro-gravity environments will eventually allow for the construction of massive structures. We're not quite there yet, but the first step out of the well was always going to be the biggest.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranOrbitalSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Skilled Starship Construction

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranOrbitalSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases shipyard manufacturing.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranOrbitalSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: You can't put just anyone in a space suit and get them to build things in orbit. It turns out that most people don't understand what an orbit is. Some improved training programs should dramatically improve our orbital manufacturing capability.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranOrbitalSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Improved Logistics

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranOrbitalSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases logistics.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranOrbitalSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Getting material to the right orbit at the right time is something we're only just coming to grips with. It turns out that orbital plane change maneuvers are really expensive. But once we scale this up, our logistical ability should greatly improve.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranOrbitalSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Storage Maximization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranOrbitalSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases hull capacity.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranOrbitalSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Ironically enough, space is at a premium in space, inside of our hulls at least. Even small improvements in packing efficiencies are worth the effort of hunting them down.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranZeroGravityConstruction_Name
StringTable.String: Zero Gravity Construction

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranZeroGravityConstruction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of Medium hulls.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranZeroGravityConstruction_Dec
StringTable.String: Most of our initial attempts at micro-gravity construction used clumsy variations of ground-based techniques, not far removed from banging rocks together. Now that we have a little more experience, we should be able to build on a much larger scale.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranZeroGravityOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Hull Reinforcement

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranZeroGravityOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases hull hit points.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranZeroGravityOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: After donating a few hulls for weapons practice, we were able to see the structural damage inflicted on them, identifying structural reinforcements that should toughen each ship substantially.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranZeroGravityOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Shipyard Efficiency

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranZeroGravityOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of hulls.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranZeroGravityOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Worksite planning in an orbital environment is a seriously complicated business, but now that we've got the hang of it, we should see significant cost savings for every hull we construct.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranZeroGravityOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: High Capacity Hulls

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranZeroGravityOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases hull capacity.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranZeroGravityOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: We're now able us to build hollow structural elements still capable of handling very high compression loads. By maximizing the use of these and routing various ancillary ship systems through the cavities, we can save space for mission critical equipment.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLargeScaleConstruction_Name
StringTable.String: Large Scale Construction

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLargeScaleConstruction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of Large hulls.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLargeScaleConstruction_Dec
StringTable.String: Building larger hulls is more involved than just adding more stuff to them. Ensuring that they won't collapse under acceleration is a serious challenge. Seating, to ensure our crews doesn't collapse under acceleration is another surprising challenge.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranOrbitalConstructionFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Hardened Hulls

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranOrbitalConstructionFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases hull hit points.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranOrbitalConstructionFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: It seems counterintuitive, but by introducing very small weaknesses in the molecular structure of our hulls, we can make them deformable in very controllable ways, which makes them quite a bit more resilient.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranOrbitalConstructionFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Starship Manufacturing Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranOrbitalConstructionFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of hulls.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranOrbitalConstructionFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: The latest generation of self-propelled manufacturing equipment will allow our workers to maneuver inside of hulls with much greater ease, reducing the challenge and expense of construction.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranOrbitalConstructionFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Hull Capacity Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranOrbitalConstructionFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases hull capacity.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranOrbitalConstructionFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: As our hulls grew ever larger, we began to lose some of the art of packing that our predecessors had. But now thanks to the scale of our ships, even very small improvements in packing can lead to more room for everything else.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMassiveScaleConstruction_Name
StringTable.String: Massive Scale Construction

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMassiveScaleConstruction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of Huge hulls.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMassiveScaleConstruction_Dec
StringTable.String: We're building massive ships capable of blotting out the stars. Obviously any ship can blot out the stars if you get close enough to it. You just don't have to get very close to these ones for that to be the case. Nor would you want to.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHullMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: Master shipwrights

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHullMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of hulls.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHullMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: That we build the best ships in the galaxy is undeniable, but that we do it so economically is what's really impressive. Our enemies have never been menaced so thriftily.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHullMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Hull Maximization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHullMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases hull capacity.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHullMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Thanks to advances in the field of bristling, never before have our ships been so bristling with weapons. They could also bristle with other things we suppose.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHullStrengthening_Name
StringTable.String: Hull Strengthening

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHullStrengthening_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of tougher hulls.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHullStrengthening_Dec
StringTable.String: Using new force field technologies, we've been able to embed strengthening fields within the structures of our vessels, making them substantially more resistant to damage. They also now tingle if you lick them.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHullRepairSystems_Name
StringTable.String: Hull Repair Systems

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHullRepairSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of hull support and repair modules.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHullRepairSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: The same field technology we use to strengthen our ships can now be used to conduct partial repairs as well, straightening and reinforcing battle-damaged structural elements.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSelfHealingHulls_Name
StringTable.String: Self Healing Hulls

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSelfHealingHulls_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of tactical repair modules.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSelfHealingHulls_Dec
StringTable.String: Tiny little self-replicating nanobots are capable of almost anything as long as we don't ask too many questions about them. Nanobot repair modules in our ships and starbases will be able to repair damage during battle itself.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCarrierTech_Name
StringTable.String: Carriers

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCarrierTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of carrier modules.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCarrierTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Carrier combat will allow us to project force while keeping our capital ships out of danger. Fighters are a lot more replaceable and there's no shortage of volunteers to fly them. Apparently there's something glamorous about dying in a very small ship.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCarrierFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Interceptor Drones

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCarrierFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the construction of cheap and light Interceptor Drones.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCarrierFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: These little drones are fast and deadly, and more importantly cheap. They also have the added advantage of not requiring a crew, which saves lives.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCarrierFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Guardian Drones

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCarrierFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the construction of cheap and light Guardian Drones.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCarrierFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: These tough little drones will guard our Support and Capital ships to the end; and when they are destroyed, no lives are lost.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHighCapacityCarriers_Name
StringTable.String: High Capacity Carriers

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHighCapacityCarriers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of high-capacity carrier modules.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHighCapacityCarriers_Dec
StringTable.String: Thanks to our latest generation of fighters - designed to be more compact and packable - along with more efficient repair, reloading, and recovery facilities, we've been able to greatly improve the carrying capacity of our carriers.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInterstellarLogistics_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Logistics

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInterstellarLogistics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of mining facilities. Increases logistics.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInterstellarLogistics_Dec
StringTable.String: It's one thing to build a ship; it's another thing to keep it running. Whether it's keeping it supplied with fuel, ammunition, or people, there is an awful lot going on behind the scenes to keep a deep-space vessel operational. None of this is exciting of course. Logistics officers are some of the most boring people you're ever likely to meet. But a necessary evil.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLogisticalOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Advanced Logistics

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLogisticalOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases logistics.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLogisticalOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we've figured out some of the issues relativistic travel creates with our timekeeping and administration, we've been able to significantly improve our logistical capacity.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLogisticalOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: High Output Mining

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLogisticalOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases mining production.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLogisticalOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Asteroid mining is an incredible ballet of activity, boring machines, ore haulers, and repair drones swarming all over the place. Keeping all these pieces moving is a challenging task, but if we can get better at it, we should see higher mining output.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLogisticalOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Sustainable Shipyards

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLogisticalOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces shipyard decay rate.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLogisticalOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Shipyards are, by some measures, the most complicated constructs humanity has ever created. Any improvement we can make to the management and operation of these beasts will result in significant cost savings.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranFleetLogisticsTech_Name
StringTable.String: Fleet Logistics

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranFleetLogisticsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Greatly increases logistics.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranFleetLogisticsTech_Dec
