StringTable.String: Scaling up our naval operations to include large multi-vessel fleets has created a number of additional logistical challenges which we're only just now coming to grips with. We'll definitely stop sending ships out without oxygen now though.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDeepSpaceLogistics_Name
StringTable.String: Deep Space Logistics

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDeepSpaceLogistics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Greatly increases logistics.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDeepSpaceLogistics_Dec
StringTable.String: Whether it's via unmanned probes, deep space caches, or our network of merchant vessels, keeping our fleets well stocked while our civilization expands has proven to be a tremendous, but still very boring, challenge.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranGalacticLogistics_Name
StringTable.String: Galactic Logistics

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranGalacticLogistics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Greatly increases logistics.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranGalacticLogistics_Dec
StringTable.String: Our mastery of mass-scale logistics is the envy of the galaxy. Well, the part of the galaxy which gets excited about logistics that is.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInterstellarMining_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Mining

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInterstellarMining_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of mining facilities.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInterstellarMining_Dec
StringTable.String: We can't have ships without the resources to build them. The same can be said for lots of things actually. Improved mining technologies will benefit every aspect of our civilization. At least the aspects of our civilization which require building things.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHighEfficiencyMining_Name
StringTable.String: High Efficiency Mining

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHighEfficiencyMining_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved mining facilities.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHighEfficiencyMining_Dec
StringTable.String: Our mining operations are capable of generating more resources while losing less miners than ever before. The miners rejoice! Well, not rejoice, exactly. They seem less grumpy than usual. Still, that's something.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranResourceExtraction_Name
StringTable.String: Resource Extraction

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranResourceExtraction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced mining facilities.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranResourceExtraction_Dec
StringTable.String: Valuable resources can be found in most asteroids in extremely low concentrations. Extracting these hasn't been practical until the development of probes capable of independently navigating the subsurface to collect the goodies within.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLosslessMining_Name
StringTable.String: Lossless Mining

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLosslessMining_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of targeted resource extractor modules.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLosslessMining_Dec
StringTable.String: Miniaturizing our resource extraction probes to the nano-scale has allowed for almost perfectly lossless resource extraction. Additionally, the rarest of rare resources can now feasibly be targeted for extraction.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWarfareTech_Name
StringTable.String: Warfare

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWarfareTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows research of weapons technologies.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWarfareTech_Dec
StringTable.String: We can't be naive about who or what we might find in the galaxy. From this point on, our ships must be armed, whether to protect against a yet unseen enemy, or even ourselves.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWeaponsSystemsTech_Name
StringTable.String: Weapons Systems

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWeaponsSystemsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic weapon systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWeaponsSystemsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The best defense is a good offense. Interestingly, so is the best offense. With that in mind, we've developed weapon systems which should prove very well suited to space-based defense. And, as discussed, offense.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWeaponsSpecializationTech1_Name
StringTable.String: Targeting Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWeaponsSpecializationTech1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the accuracy of all weapon systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWeaponsSpecializationTech1_Dec
StringTable.String: We have increased the targeting systems of our existing weapons substantially, and what we have learned will apply to future weapons systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWeaponsSpecializationTech2_Name
StringTable.String: Miniturization Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWeaponsSpecializationTech2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of all weapons systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWeaponsSpecializationTech2_Dec
StringTable.String: We have reduced the mass of our existing weapons systems, and what we have learned will apply to future weapons as well.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWeaponsSpecializationTech3_Name
StringTable.String: Production Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWeaponsSpecializationTech3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of all weapons systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWeaponsSpecializationTech3_Dec
StringTable.String: We have reduced the cost of our existing weapons systems, and what we have learned will apply to future weapons as well.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBeamWeapons_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Weapons

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBeamWeapons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBeamWeapons_Dec
StringTable.String: Whether light, particles, or both at the same time, there's an awful lot of destructive potential in suddenly sending a lot of it all at one place.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBeamWeaponOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Focused Beam Weapons

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBeamWeaponOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the damage of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBeamWeaponOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: A new generation of the ultra transparent materials we use in our focusing crystals has made it possible to increase the damage output of our beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBeamWeaponOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Low-Cost Beam Weapons

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBeamWeaponOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBeamWeaponOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Beam weapons will never be cheap, but some economies of scale have led to price reductions in the magnification and focusing equipment these weapons rely upon.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBeamWeaponOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Weapons Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBeamWeaponOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBeamWeaponOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Lacking the requirements for ammunition storage, beam weapons have always been mass-efficient. And after some hard work by the boys and girls in the lab, now they're a bit more so.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMatterDisruption_Name
StringTable.String: Matter Disruption

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMatterDisruption_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMatterDisruption_Dec
StringTable.String: Our researchers have been able to weaponize a collimated beam of particles capable of disrupting the strong nuclear force, severing the bonds which hold the nucleus together, turning matter into smaller chunks of matter.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHighEnergyFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Amplification

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHighEnergyFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the damage of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHighEnergyFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Advances in crystallography have created a new generation of focusing crystals capable of handling much greater quantities of energy without fracturing. All of our beam weapons just got a little bit badder.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHighEnergyFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Manufacturing Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHighEnergyFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHighEnergyFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Manufacturing beam weapons is as much art as science, requiring highly trained technicians to individually tune each weapon. But if we can standardize this a bit, and even automate portions of it, we should be able to reduce the cost of each unit.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHighEnergyFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Low Mass Beam Weapons

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHighEnergyFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHighEnergyFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: The heaviest parts of beam weapons has always been the charge coils and their associated cooling equipment. With the latest generation of super-conductors we can now build these smaller and more compact than ever.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPlasmaProjection_Name
StringTable.String: Plasma Projection

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPlasmaProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPlasmaProjection_Dec
StringTable.String: We're now able to generate collimated plasma containment fields at incredible distances. The upshot to this is that we can now send massive quantities of plasma at relativistic velocities in the direction of anything we don't like very much.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBeamWeaponMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Master Beam Assembly

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBeamWeaponMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBeamWeaponMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our supply chain for the creation of plasma containment fields had a couple of kinks that needed to get worked out, but now that we have, we expect to be able to create beam weapons for far cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBeamWeaponMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: High Density Beam Weapons

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBeamWeaponMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBeamWeaponMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: We're now able to push our beam weapons right up to the energy density limits that physics allow. If we want any more power per unit of mass, we may have to move to a different universe.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEnergyPhasing_Name
StringTable.String: Energy Phasing

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEnergyPhasing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of devastating beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEnergyPhasing_Dec
StringTable.String: The phaser particle is almost impossible to understand if you don't have several advanced degrees and possibly an extra brain. In short, these particles can induce a chain reaction that breaks an enemy down into neutrinos, effectively evaporating it.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDoomRayTech_Name
StringTable.String: Doom Ray

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDoomRayTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDoomRayTech_Dec
StringTable.String: An adaptation of the phaser particle emitter has resulted in massive improvements in the induced matter-breakdown reaction. Also of note, our scientists are pretty sure the reaction won't consume the entire universe. So that's good news.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBeamWeaponAugmentation_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Weapon Augmentation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBeamWeaponAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of beam support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBeamWeaponAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: We've found that the capacity of our beam energy storage systems can be augmented by an external field, which allows for increased beam output. Such fields could be projected at a distance, improving the beam output of an entire fleet.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHighEnergyTransfer_Name
StringTable.String: High Energy Transfer

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHighEnergyTransfer_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved beam support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHighEnergyTransfer_Dec
StringTable.String: After considerable study in the way that beam weapons interact on a subatomic level with both shield systems and hulls, we've developed systems capable of reducing the effectiveness of enemy shields or absorbing enemy beam attacks on our own vessels.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHighEnergyMagnification_Name
StringTable.String: High Energy Magnification

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHighEnergyMagnification_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced beam support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHighEnergyMagnification_Dec
StringTable.String: An improved understanding of the effects our beam augmentation fields have has resulted in the possibility of even greater beam output. Additionally, we can now build beams that can cripple enemy shields.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMissileWeapons_Name
StringTable.String: Missile Weapons

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMissileWeapons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMissileWeapons_Dec
StringTable.String: Conceptually simple, though there's no shame in that, missile-based weapons provide a tremendous amount of punch for their cost.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMissileOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Rapid Fire Missiles

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMissileOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the firing speed of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMissileOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our weapons engineers have determined that shooting more missiles at things makes them blow up faster. Which seems obvious in retrospect. Anyways, our missile launchers shoot more now.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMissileOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Low Cost Missiles

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMissileOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMissileOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Missiles were always going to be the most cost-effective means of making things hurt, and now they're a little bit more so.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMissileOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Missile Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMissileOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMissileOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Reviews of training data and engagement encounters reveals one overriding request from the field. "We want more missiles. Give us more missiles." Well, having reduced the mass of our launchers and ammunition racks, we're now able to do just that.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHarpoonTech_Name
StringTable.String: Harpoons

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHarpoonTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHarpoonTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The Harpoon class of missiles employ a number of improvements in speed, range, tracking and warhead yield, resulting in our most powerful conventional missile system yet.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWarheadFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Warhead Acceleration

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWarheadFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the range of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWarheadFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: More target drones have given their lives for our glory, and a careful analysis of their deaths has revealed some exciting possibilities in the field of shaped charges, which should improve the destructive yield of our warheads.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWarheadFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Warhead Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWarheadFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWarheadFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: The most delicate part of missile manufacturing was the warhead, for obvious reasons. The latest generation of ultra-stable explosives should reduce both manufacturing costs and workplace accidents significantly.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWarheadFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Low Mass Warheads

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWarheadFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWarheadFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: By using the latest generation of shaped-charge warheads to reduce the weight of each individual missile, with no corresponding loss of destructive power, we can make room for more missile launchers in total.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPhotonicWarheads_Name
StringTable.String: Photonic Warheads

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPhotonicWarheads_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPhotonicWarheads_Dec
StringTable.String: By embedding a device in our warheads which releases a high energy burst of photons at the moment of impact, we can achieve substantial penetration against both armor and shield systems, greatly increasing their destructive potential.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPayloadMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Master Missile Assembly

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPayloadMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPayloadMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our missile manufacturing facilities are now almost perfectly efficient, wasting no material whatsoever. Destruction shouldn't come so cheap, yet here we are.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPayloadMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: High Density Warheads

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPayloadMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPayloadMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: A new field-based guidance system which uses force fields to provide final maneuvering capabilities should cut down on the weight of our missile systems a bit more.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPhotonTorpedos_Name
StringTable.String: Photon Torpedoes

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPhotonTorpedos_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of devastating missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPhotonTorpedos_Dec
StringTable.String: By matching a wide-spectrum version of the photon-encasement armor-piercing technology with our latest antimatter warheads, we've created a weapon with truly colossal damage potential. They glow a new color too.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranNightmareTorpedoTech_Name
StringTable.String: Nightmare Torpedoes

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranNightmareTorpedoTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranNightmareTorpedoTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The Nightmare torpedo contains a tiny singularity trapped in a pocket universe, which upon being released causes horrifying damage to anything foolish enough to be standing by a place we're firing something called Nightmare Torpedoes at.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMissileAugmentation_Name
StringTable.String: Missile Augmentation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMissileAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of missile support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMissileAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: Our weapons researchers have come up with a number of ship- or starbase-based sensor systems which can improve the tracking, and ultimately the range, of our missiles.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAdvancedMissileGuidance_Name
StringTable.String: Advanced Missile Guidance

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAdvancedMissileGuidance_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved missile support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAdvancedMissileGuidance_Dec
StringTable.String: Improved decoy and camouflage systems will greatly increase the survivability of our missiles when faced with point defenses. And our missile support modules now feature a number of predictive systems which should help missile range even more.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIntelligentWarheads_Name
StringTable.String: Intelligent Warheads

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIntelligentWarheads_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced missile support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIntelligentWarheads_Dec
StringTable.String: Cluster warheads are capable of specifically targeting and neutralizing enemy point defense systems. And our missile support systems can now make use of information-sharing "pilot" missiles, which allow for more efficient guidance and improved range.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranKineticWeapons_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Weapons

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranKineticWeapons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranKineticWeapons_Dec
StringTable.String: There's just something nice and honest about a projectile, isn't there? And thanks to a little help from teams of massive electromagnets, we've now got some extremely fast projectiles to work with.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranKineticOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Range Extension

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranKineticOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the range of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranKineticOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: A switch to slightly smaller projectiles, along with improved energy delivery systems, has led to significant improvements in the speed of each projectile, and thus the effective range of each unit.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranKineticOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Weapon Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranKineticOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranKineticOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Never before have we needed to make electromagnetic coils in such quantity, and the early days of kinetic weapons were plagued by supply problems. But that's finally been addressed, and we should see cost savings across all of our kinetic weapon programs.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranKineticOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranKineticOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranKineticOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Some experiments with the winding patterns of our electromagnetic coils has revealed a number of subtle synergistic effects which we can take advantage of, leading to tighter, more compact coils, and ultimately, lower mass weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPulseCannonTech_Name
StringTable.String: Pulse Cannons

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPulseCannonTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPulseCannonTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Research efforts to emit tight clusters of particles at rapid velocities has led to a weapon which gets around some of the practical limitations of slug-based mass drivers. Called pulse cannons, they have similar tactical characteristics as previous generations of kinetic weapons. They're just much more powerful.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranKineticAccelerationFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Frictionless Acceleration

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranKineticAccelerationFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the range of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranKineticAccelerationFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our newest superconductors and the steeper energy delivery curves they enable should lead to higher muzzle velocities, at the trade off of smaller projectiles. These weapons should have a longer effective range with no reduction in damage potential.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranKineticAccelerationFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Low Cost Accelerators

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranKineticAccelerationFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranKineticAccelerationFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: The latest generation of superconducting electromagnetic coils and their less-strenuous cooling requirements make them much less fragile to handle. We expect to see significant cost savings now that we won't break as many during production.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranKineticAccelerationFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Low Mass Accelerators

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranKineticAccelerationFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranKineticAccelerationFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Our new ultra-low resistance electromagnets generate a lot more kick per unit weight, leading to lower mass accelerators. We can feel free to cram more of them into whatever we're cramming them in to.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranGravitonThrower_Name
StringTable.String: Graviton Thrower

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranGravitonThrower_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranGravitonThrower_Dec
StringTable.String: By launching pulses of gravitons we can induce massive shifts in the local gravity of enemy ships that they strike. This will cause incredible amounts of damage, and probably make anyone standing nearby feel really dizzy right before they die.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranKineticMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Master Accelerator Assembly

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranKineticMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranKineticMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: "We Make Kinetic Weapons Faster," is probably the dumbest slogan ever conceived of, but the factory workers seem really proud of it, so no-one had the heart to tell them. And to be fair, they do make them really quite quickly and cheaply now.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranKineticMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: High Density Accelerators

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranKineticMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranKineticMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our scientists have all but mastered kinetic weapons, having made them as mass efficient as theoretically possible, allowing even our smallest vessels to pack a hellacious punch.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranQuantumDrivers_Name
StringTable.String: Quantum Drivers

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranQuantumDrivers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of devastating kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranQuantumDrivers_Dec
StringTable.String: Quantum Drivers fire shells that contain small quantum fields which pull in a tremendous amount of mass from a neighboring dimension on impact. We're not sure which dimension. We can only hope that they didn't need that mass.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSingularityDrivers_Name
StringTable.String: Singularity Drivers

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSingularityDrivers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSingularityDrivers_Dec
StringTable.String: The pinnacle of kinetic weapon technology, these launch micro-singularities that collapse out of existence shortly after impact. These are bad news, the worst news really, for anyone who can't get out of the way.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranKineticAugmentation_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Augmentation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranKineticAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of kinetic support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranKineticAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: Inertial dampening should be impossible in this universe, which is why we were a little surprised we were able to pull it off. We've used this stroke of luck to create systems which can boost the velocity and effective range of our kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMassManipulation_Name
StringTable.String: Mass Manipulation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMassManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved kinetic support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMassManipulation_Dec
StringTable.String: We can now embed inertial modification tech inside projectiles, allowing them to generate ultra-dense outer surfaces for a brief period to improve their armor penetrating capabilities. Our kinetic augmentation systems have gotten a bit better too.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInertialMagnification_Name
StringTable.String: Inertial Magnification

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInertialMagnification_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced kinetic support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInertialMagnification_Dec
StringTable.String: Our projectiles are now capable of attacking armor directly, creating low density fissures that can cause the whole structure to splinter. Additionally our kinetic augmentation systems have increased their range boosting effects yet again.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMilitarizationTech_Name
StringTable.String: Militarization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMilitarizationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of military shipyards and defense platforms.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMilitarizationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: We already have a significant amount of structures in orbit and on the ground, all of which can be militarized with modest extra investment and some new uniforms.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMilitarySpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Enhanced Training

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMilitarySpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves soldier effectiveness.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMilitarySpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our military's regular training exercises are beginning to pay off, and we can now expect our soldiers to be far more effective when conducting ground-based operations.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMilitarySpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Defensive Fortifications

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMilitarySpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves planetary defense.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMilitarySpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: We can't assume that our space-based defenses will always be effective. Our worlds will be significantly more secure if we can harden our ground fortifications and prepare plans to rapidly form colonial militias when they're needed.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMilitarySpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Resistance Forces

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMilitarySpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase our colonies' ability to resist invaders.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMilitarySpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: By training our population in basic resistance tactics, we can help them be ready for anything. A prepared population can often be the difference between victory and defeat when invaded.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPlanetaryInvasion_Name
StringTable.String: Planetary Invasion

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPlanetaryInvasion_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows transport modules to be constructed.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPlanetaryInvasion_Dec
StringTable.String: We've developed the equipment and tactics necessary to land on a world and take it by force. A little hard to imagine it, but we must accept that humans are now the alien invaders.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInvasionOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Planetary Bombardment

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInvasionOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows planetary bombardment to be conducted during invasions.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInvasionOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: So it turns out that thanks to the properties of mass, the easiest way to pacify something is to just drop something on it. It takes a bit of practice to get right, but the practice is fun itself.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInvasionOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Information Warfare

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInvasionOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows informational warfare tactics to be used during invasions.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInvasionOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Information warfare lacks a certain visceral appeal. But EMPs and targeted hacking attacks can cripple an enemy's coordination and limit the effectiveness of their defenses without needing to risk any of our own viscera.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInvasionOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Biological Warfare

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInvasionOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows biological warfare tactics to be used during invasions.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInvasionOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Let's be honest: If we're now the alien invaders, there's no reason we have to pretend we're the good guys. Yes, we'll have to live with the consequences of using biological weapons, but at least we'll be the ones who live.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranStallerMarines_Name
StringTable.String: Stellar Marines

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranStallerMarines_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves soldier effectiveness and transport capacity.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranStallerMarines_Dec
StringTable.String: A greater understanding of the tactics and training required for effective ground-based combat has led to a new form of military unit which specializes in establishing beachheads in unfriendly gravity wells.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranGravitationalFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Tidal Disruption

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranGravitationalFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows tidal disruption tactics to be used during invasions.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranGravitationalFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: By directing powerful gravitational fields at enemy ground defenses, we can induce flooding and even tectonic activity. The ground shall quake beneath our enemy's feet or feet-analogs.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranGravitationalFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Core Detonation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranGravitationalFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows core detonation tactics to be used during invasions.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranGravitationalFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Inducing a planet to suddenly experience massive, worldwide volcanic activity is a pretty extreme step. That said, it certainly will pacify any hostiles. Also liquefy them.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDroneSoldiers_Name
StringTable.String: Drone Soldiers

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDroneSoldiers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves soldier effectiveness and transport capacity.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDroneSoldiers_Dec
StringTable.String: There are massive benefits in unit reliability and coordination if our troops are programmed to unfailingly do what we tell them to. And we won't have to feel so bad about losing these ones.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAdvancedInvasionTactics_Name
StringTable.String: Advanced Invasion Tactics

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAdvancedInvasionTactics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves soldier effectiveness and allows construction of advanced transports.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAdvancedInvasionTactics_Dec
StringTable.String: A new generation of invasion transports, along with a new generation of soldiers that don't mind being stacked like firewood, allows us to put boots on the ground faster than ever.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranFortification_Name
StringTable.String: Fortification

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranFortification_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of defensive fortifications and improves planetary defense.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranFortification_Dec
StringTable.String: We mustn't neglect our own defenses, and with the latest generation of defensive fortifications, our planets and starbases will be able to put up a much tougher fight.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDefensiveFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Bombardment Shelters

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDefensiveFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes all colonies immune to planetary bombardment.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDefensiveFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: By moving our most critical structures underground and providing similar shelters for civilians and troops, we can dramatically limit the effectiveness of most forms of orbital bombardment.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDefensiveFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Information Systems Hardening

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDefensiveFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes all colonies immune to information warfare.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDefensiveFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our defensive experts have identified a number of vulnerabilities in our ground-based C&C systems, and urgently recommend that we harden them.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDefensiveFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Adaptive Vaccinations

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDefensiveFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes all colonies immune to biological warfare.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDefensiveFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: It's impossible to conventionally vaccinate against an unknown biological attack. Adaptive vaccines are engineered lifeforms that lie dormant, ready to rapidly assist a immune system to fight new infections the moment they appear.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranOrbitalDefencePlatform_Name
StringTable.String: Orbital Defense Platform

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranOrbitalDefencePlatform_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Adds defensive fighters to orbit and improves planetary defense.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranOrbitalDefencePlatform_Dec
StringTable.String: A dedicated orbital defense platform will provide an additional layer of defense for our planetary systems, and take some of the defensive responsibility off of our starbases.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPlanetaryDefenseDome_Name
StringTable.String: Planetary Defense Dome

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPlanetaryDefenseDome_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Planetary Defense Dome and improves planetary defense.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPlanetaryDefenseDome_Dec
StringTable.String: With the resources and energy available to ground-based structures, we're now able to construct a shielded dome with so many layers of redundancy that it's effectively invulnerable to any orbital bombardment.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDefenseSystemTech_Name
StringTable.String: Defense Systems

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDefenseSystemTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic defensive systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDefenseSystemTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Naval officers are notoriously squishy and otherwise difficult to protect in a ship that operates in hard vacuum. But we've got to try, otherwise the squishy officers will stop getting into the ships.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDefensiveSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDefensiveSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of shields.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDefensiveSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Deflecting or diffusing incoming weapon fire is really, really hard; and we're far from having a really good understanding of it. Our latest round of research has only succeeded in making existing shield systems a bit cheaper to build.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDefensiveSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Point Defense Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDefensiveSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of point defenses.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDefensiveSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Making our point defenses fire more crap into the space around the ship is a simple solution to a complicated question. Though still a surprisingly effective one.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDefensiveSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDefensiveSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of armor.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDefensiveSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: By adjusting the size and positioning of our armor panels, we've been able to minimize overlap and other inefficiencies, and can now provide the same level of protection to our ships for less overall weight.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranShieldSystems_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Systems

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranShieldSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved shield systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranShieldSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: No longer must our ships cower behind crude deflector fields. The latest generation of shields, although expensive, are capable of stopping incoming attacks outright, rather than just deflecting or diffusing their impact.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranShieldOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Enhancement

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranShieldOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases shield strength.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranShieldOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Of all the suggestions we've received from the field on how to improve our shield systems, "Please make them bigger," seemed to be the most popular. So we've done that.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranShieldOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Low Cost Shield Systems

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranShieldOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces shield cost.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranShieldOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: We probably shouldn't talk in front of the troops about our efforts to make our shield systems cheaper, even if it means more shields to go around for everyone. Because that's not how they'll see it.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranShieldOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranShieldOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces shield mass.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranShieldOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: The first few generations of field emitters used in our shield systems were incredibly bulky and cumbersome. And they still are, frankly. Just a bit less so now.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBarrierFieldGeneration_Name
StringTable.String: Barrier Field Generation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBarrierFieldGeneration_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced shield systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBarrierFieldGeneration_Dec
StringTable.String: The latest generation of shields, the so-called Barrier Field, is capable of absorbing a portion of the energy which strikes it. This dramatically increases the energy efficiency of the system, allowing for ultimately much more powerful shields.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBarrierSystemFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: High Output Shield Generators

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBarrierSystemFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases shield strength.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBarrierSystemFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: The first generation of energy absorbers in our Barrier Field systems used a model of capacitor which occasionally exploded violently. Crews had decidedly mixed feelings about this, so we replaced those capacitors with a slightly more robust model.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBarrierSystemFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Low Cost Shield Generators

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBarrierSystemFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces shield cost.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBarrierSystemFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Since the first few shield emitters went out the door, we've slowly been able to achieve some economies of scale in the manufacture of these systems, reducing the cost of all future installations.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBarrierSystemFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Low Mass Shield Generators

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBarrierSystemFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces shield mass.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBarrierSystemFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: We've recently been able to shave a ton of weight off of our shield generators thanks to the latest generation of superconductors and their less extensive cooling requirements.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranForceFieldTech_Name
StringTable.String: Force Fields

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranForceFieldTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic shield systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranForceFieldTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The latest generation of shields are capable of directing vast amounts of additional energy to a specific section of shields within nanoseconds of the moment of impact, allowing for shields which are much stronger relative to their respective weight.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranShieldMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Master Shield Assembly

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranShieldMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces shield cost.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranShieldMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Cheaper shields never meant less effective shields, and it's only taken a few decades for our crews to finally understand that. Which is good, because our shields are spectacularly cheap now.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranShieldMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: High Density Shield Generators

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranShieldMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces shield mass.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranShieldMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: It's impossible to make the energy emitters of our shields any denser our engineers claim. They claim that kind of thing a lot and always take it back later, but they seem pretty sure this time.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInvulnerabilityTech_Name
StringTable.String: Invulnerability

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInvulnerabilityTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate shield systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInvulnerabilityTech_Dec
StringTable.String: "Invulnerable" may be a bit of an exaggeration. Our researchers allow that some theoretical weapons could penetrate these shields, but those would be some pretty terrifying weapons. Even then you'd rather be behind this shield than not.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranShieldSupportSystems_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Support Systems

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranShieldSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of shield support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranShieldSupportSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: Advances in the focusing capabilities of our shield generators has given us the ability to generate and augment the shields of friendly ships. This should provide massive tactical and strategic options for fleet operations.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranShieldAugmentation_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Augmentation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranShieldAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved shield support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranShieldAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: The same technology we've used to generate shields at a distance can now be done with our Barrier Field systems, allowing for even greater improvements in fleet survivability.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEnergyFieldManipulation_Name
StringTable.String: Energy Field Manipulation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEnergyFieldManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced shield support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEnergyFieldManipulation_Dec
StringTable.String: Our mastery of the energy fields needed to create and maintain shields has resulted in a couple interesting new technologies, capable of interfering with enemy shield systems, or massively shielding friendly units within range.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPointDefenses_Name
StringTable.String: Point Defenses

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPointDefenses_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPointDefenses_Dec
StringTable.String: Arrays of tiny computer controlled railguns that track and destroy incoming missiles are unparalleled at protecting ships and starbases from missile attacks, though they still aren't terribly helpful at defending against other classes of weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPointDefenseOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Smart Point Defenses

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPointDefenseOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases point defense strength.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPointDefenseOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: A careful analysis of various missile performance envelopes has led us to adjust the firing patterns of our point defense systems, making them a bit more effective.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPointDefenseOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Low Cost Point Defenses

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPointDefenseOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces point defense cost.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPointDefenseOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: The sensor equipment our point defense systems use is fairly specialized equipment that was initially quite rare and costly. Now that we're building a lot of point defenses, the price of those systems is starting to come down.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPointDefenseOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Point Defense Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPointDefenseOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces point defense mass.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPointDefenseOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: The slugs fired by point defenses don't need to be large, and were limited by the fact that we couldn't build railguns any smaller. Now that we can build more compact units, we should see significant weight savings for all our point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCounterMeasures_Name
StringTable.String: Counter Measures

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCounterMeasures_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCounterMeasures_Dec
StringTable.String: By deploying electronic countermeasures which interfere with and confuse incoming missile attacks, we've greatly increased the survivability of our ships and starbases. Against missiles at least. Hard to confuse a laser.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCounterMeasureFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Adaptive Counter Measures

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCounterMeasureFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases point defense strength.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCounterMeasureFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: There's always a generational game of leap frog being played between missile designers and ECM designers, but we believe our latest algorithms have given us the leg up on the bad guys this time.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCounterMeasureFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Counter Measure Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCounterMeasureFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces point defense cost.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCounterMeasureFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our earliest attempts at ECM suites were heavily customizable, requiring a great deal of fine tuning to perform well. Now that we know what works, we can automate much more of the manufacturing and installation process.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCounterMeasureFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Low Mass Counter Measures

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCounterMeasureFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces point defense mass.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCounterMeasureFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Our first ECM suites were cobbled together from a half dozen different processors and transmitters. We've since streamlined those into a single unit which weighs much less.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDroneSentrySystems_Name
StringTable.String: Drone Sentry Systems

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDroneSentrySystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDroneSentrySystems_Dec
StringTable.String: By installing our point defense systems on drone platforms that orbit our ships at a distance, we can add a valuable extra layer of protection against missile attacks.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDroneSystemMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Master Point Defense Assembly

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDroneSystemMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces point defense cost.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDroneSystemMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: To be fair, only a few of our drone systems have ever actually shot each other in combat situations. But by minimizing that just a little bit more, we should be able to make our point defenses a little more cost effective, if a bit less funny.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDroneSystemMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: High Density Point Defenses

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDroneSystemMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces point defense mass.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDroneSystemMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Once we realized point defense drones don't need much personal space, we were able to start packing them in a lot tighter.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArreonMissileDefenseTech_Name
StringTable.String: Aereon Missile Defense

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArreonMissileDefenseTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArreonMissileDefenseTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The ultimate in point defense technology, featuring the latest generation of micro-drones armed with railguns, ECM and smart chafe. Aereon systems fill the space around a ship with a cloud of debris so thick no enemy missiles are likely to survive.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPointDefenseSupportSystem_Name
StringTable.String: Point Defense Support

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPointDefenseSupportSystem_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of point defense support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPointDefenseSupportSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: Our experience working with small scale point defenses has led to a type of long-range missile tracking system which should enhance the point defense capabilities of an entire fleet.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPointDefenseAugmentation_Name
StringTable.String: Point Defense Augmentation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPointDefenseAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved point defense support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPointDefenseAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: Wide-area missile disruptors enhance the effectiveness of our existing countermeasures, adding a much needed layer of extra missile security to entire fleets.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPointDefenseManipulation_Name
StringTable.String: Point Defense Manipulation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPointDefenseManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced point defense support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPointDefenseManipulation_Dec
StringTable.String: Fleet-wide drone systems will provide massive missile security to an entire fleet. Additionally we can now equip point defense disruptors, essentially a type of counter-countermeasure, which should boost the effectiveness of our own missile attacks.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArmorSystems_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Systems

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArmorSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved armor systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArmorSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: A big lump of ultra-dense material remains an effective, if unsubtle, method of protection from modern space-based weaponry. Subtlety is overrated though.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArmorOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Reinforced Armor

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArmorOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases armor strength.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArmorOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: A simple mistake by one of our fabricators resulted in a set of armor panels marginally denser and more resilient than we'd seen before. It took us a long time to replicate that mistake, but now that we have, our ships should be a little tougher to kill.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArmorOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Low-Cost Armor

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArmorOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces armor cost.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArmorOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: One of the biggest challenges with armor manufacturing was simply the logistics of moving rare and heavy resources and materials around. Now that we've got our supply chain sorted out, we can expect to see some nice cost savings.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArmorOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArmorOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces armor mass.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArmorOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: By its very nature, armor is always going to be a fairly mass-intensive means of protection. That said, we can do a few things to improve the precision and fit of armor plating, which should cut down on weight a bit.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDurantiumCompositeTech_Name
StringTable.String: Durantium Composite

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDurantiumCompositeTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced armor systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDurantiumCompositeTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Certain materials, when stacked in specific arrangements, have a synergistic effect on the strength of their neighbors under compressive forces. We call these new composites Durantium, and they should tremendously increase the survivability of our ships.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArmorFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Lamination

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArmorFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases armor strength.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArmorFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: A careful study of battle-damaged ships has revealed previously unknown weaknesses in our armor systems. Basically, we know why some of them were cracking in half now. We'll do something about that right away.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArmorFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Manufacturing Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArmorFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces armor cost.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArmorFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: If our crews ask, it's not that our armor is cheap. It's that we've found a more efficient way of manufacturing it. But yes, it is pretty cheap.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArmorFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Mass Reduction

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArmorFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces armor mass.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArmorFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Some experiments with the arrangement of our Durantium composites has revealed that we can get away with slightly less dense materials at certain layers with no impact to the armor's effectiveness.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranKanviumLaminateTech_Name
StringTable.String: Kanvium Laminate

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranKanviumLaminateTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic armor systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranKanviumLaminateTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Kanvium armor uses a new type of lamination which causes surrounding materials to partially fluidize on impact, deforming in a recoverable way. Impacts are spread out over a much larger area, then flow back into its original shape.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArmorMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Master Armorers

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArmorMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces armor cost.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArmorMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: With modern armoring systems, the design of the armor informs the shape of the ship as much as the other way around. Properly armoring a ship involves a complicated series of trade offs, which when we get right, mean ships protected for much cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArmorMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: High Density Armor

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArmorMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces armor mass.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArmorMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: On a weight basis, our armor systems are now as efficient as they can possibly be, 99.3% of all total installed mass dedicated to offensive energy absorption or dispersion. That's really, really good the researchers promise.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranZeroPointArmorTech_Name
StringTable.String: Zero Point Armor

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranZeroPointArmorTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate armor systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranZeroPointArmorTech_Dec
StringTable.String: We have a hard time proving zero point armor even exists, only knowing of it by the effect it has. It appears to tap into the zero-point energy of the quantum vacuum to repulse incoming energy. It's almost impossibly tough, we can prove that much.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArmorSupportSystems_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Support Systems

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArmorSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of armor support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArmorSupportSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: In the factory, we've begun producing armor plating with a variety of force field based technologies. By adapting these fields into ship modules, we can create a hardening effect at a distance, making every ship in a fleet substantially more durable.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArmorEnhancement_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Enhancement

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArmorEnhancement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved armor support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArmorEnhancement_Dec
StringTable.String: The fields that we use to generate hardening effects have 27 different "poles" which can be cycled through, changing the alignment of the hardening effects in the affected material; generating substantially stronger, more resilient materials.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIntegrityFieldProjection_Name
StringTable.String: Integrity Field Projection

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIntegrityFieldProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced armor support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIntegrityFieldProjection_Dec
StringTable.String: Our latest generation of armoring fields no longer just generate hardening effects at a distance, but can induce material fluidization and shape recovery. These new Integrity Fields can make our fleets invulnerable to all but the most powerful attacks.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCommunicationsTech_Name
StringTable.String: Governance

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCommunicationsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows research of communications technologies.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCommunicationsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: We've already seen glimpses of evidence that we're not alone in this galaxy. Which presents an incredible danger, but also, perhaps, an opportunity. But also, let's stress again, danger.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTranslatorTech_Name
StringTable.String: Universal Translator

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTranslatorTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Can begin communicating with aliens. Boosts diplomacy.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTranslatorTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Intense study of the fragments of alien text and speech has allowed us to create a Universal Translator that will let us communicate with any new races we come across.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDiplomaticSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Diplomatic Reasoning

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDiplomaticSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases diplomacy.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDiplomaticSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: We've begun simulating different rhetorical and diplomatic approaches when dealing with aliens, revealing several ways we might improve their attitudes towards us. Our role-playing has enabled us to talk prettier, essentially.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDiplomaticSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Influential Voice

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDiplomaticSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases influence.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDiplomaticSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our culture has a way of communicating what our diplomats cannot. By increasing the ease with which other civilizations can access our culture we can win hearts and minds before we even get to the negotiating table.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDiplomaticSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Passionate Communicator

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDiplomaticSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Get better deals when trading with other races.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDiplomaticSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: The way we see the universe doesn't have to be unique to us. By clearly communicating our thinking to outside parties, they may begin seeing the same way as us, boosting whatever effects we hoped our ideology might cause.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInterstellarGovernance_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Governance

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInterstellarGovernance_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Stellar Empire form of government.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInterstellarGovernance_Dec
StringTable.String: Governing a civilization on this scale parallels our experience exploring our own world hundreds of years ago. A history we'd better refamiliarize ourselves with quickly, before we get any space tea dumped in our harbors.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPoliticalSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Federalist Party

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPoliticalSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Federalist Party.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPoliticalSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Federalist parties advocate a relatively weak central government that offloads much of its responsibility to lower, more local governmental groups. This bias towards local regulation seems to encourage economic development.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPoliticalSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Populist Party

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPoliticalSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Populist Party.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPoliticalSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Populist forms of government are designed to make people happy, even at the cost of economic strength. As a side-effect of this relentless interest in pleasing others, Populist governments are often very good at diplomacy.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPoliticalSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Universalist Party

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPoliticalSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Universalist Party.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPoliticalSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Universalist governments attempt to be all things to all people. That can be a lot of people, none of whom ever seem to agree on anything, but a balanced approach like this at least ensures a government has no weak spots.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranGalacticGovernance_Name
StringTable.String: Galactic Governance

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranGalacticGovernance_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Galactic Republic form of government.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranGalacticGovernance_Dec
StringTable.String: By granting limited powers of self rule to various elements of society, reserving the most critical functions for our own central government, we expect to see increased public satisfaction and all the benefits which come with it.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPoliticalFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Industrialist Party

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPoliticalFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Industrialist Party.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPoliticalFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Industrialist governments seek to maximize industrial capacity by rewarding citizens based entirely on their productivity. From top to bottom, society is organized to encourage hard work and not having fun.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPoliticalFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Mercantile Party

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPoliticalFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Mercantile Party.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPoliticalFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Mercantilists seek to ensure their civilization's prosperity through trade, careful negotiations, brutally unfair tariffs, and outright espionage.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPoliticalFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Technologist Party

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPoliticalFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Technologist Party.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPoliticalFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Any time two civilizations have met the less technologically advanced one has come out worse from the encounter. Technologists dedicate all governmental resources to ensure that they never become that dumber civilization.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInterstellarDemocracyTech_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Democracy

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInterstellarDemocracyTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Interstellar Democracy form of government.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInterstellarDemocracyTech_Dec
StringTable.String: A system which lets people pick their own rulers, or at least think they're picking their own rulers, has obvious merits in terms of approval and productivity, although adapting it to a civilization this big has proven challenging.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPoliticalMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: War Party

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPoliticalMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of War Party.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPoliticalMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Whether it's because they consider all other civilizations to be inferior, or simply terrifying, members of the War Party are willing to put their entire civilization on a military footing to do something about it.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPoliticalMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: Pacifist Party

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPoliticalMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Pacifist Party.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPoliticalMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Pacifist governments forego the language of aggression and militarization and focus all their efforts on promoting culture and social welfare. This makes them well liked in the galactic community, and their words travel far.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranStarFederationTech_Name
StringTable.String: Star Federation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranStarFederationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of the Star Federation form of government.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranStarFederationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The ultimate in space-based governance, an ideal blend of all the freedoms, responsibilities, and delicious seasonings which make up an ideal civic life.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDiplomacyTech_Name
StringTable.String: Diplomacy

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDiplomacyTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of embassies and the formation of basic treaties.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDiplomacyTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The profit potential an alliance with our neighbors offers is something we should always consider. And failing that, the cost of talking with them will be a fraction of the cost of going to war with them.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDiplomaticOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Economic Treaty

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDiplomaticOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the formation of economic treaties.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDiplomaticOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Economic treaties will lower tariffs and other obstacles that discourage business activities. When well designed, these treaties should result in increased wealth for both parties.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDiplomaticOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Treaty

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDiplomaticOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the formation of cultural treaties.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDiplomaticOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: By increasing the interchange of cultural products and making it easier for civilians to cross borders, we can hope to increase the influence we have on our neighbors.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDiplomaticOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Research Treaty

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDiplomaticOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the formation of research treaties.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDiplomaticOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: By entering into formal information sharing agreements with other civilizations, our researchers can more easily accumulate the masses of data which modern research often requires.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInterstellarAlliances_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Alliances

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInterstellarAlliances_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of improved diplomatic buildings. Increases diplomacy.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInterstellarAlliances_Dec
StringTable.String: Turning a friendly species into a formal ally is a supremely delicate process. There's only one way these talks can go right, and a thousand ways they can go wrong. The etiquette of alien handshakes alone is fraught with peril.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAllianceFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Military Alliance

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAllianceFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the formation of military alliances.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAllianceFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Formal military alliances will make a war with humanity that much more imposing to our foes. The trade-off is that we risk being drawn into wars not of our choosing. Friends are cheap to have, but allies can be very expensive indeed.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAllianceFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Technological Alliance

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAllianceFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the formation of technological alliances.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAllianceFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: A technological alliance will dramatically ramp up the research sharing programs we have with our ally. This is valuable information, so we must be sure of their friendship before entering such an agreement.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAllianceFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Alliance

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAllianceFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the formation of cultural alliances.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAllianceFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: A formal cultural alliance will lower almost all barriers to the movement of people and ideas across borders with our neighbor. Not only will this bring us closer, we can hope to have a bigger influence on our neighbor's culture.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEminenceTech_Name
StringTable.String: Eminence

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEminenceTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of advanced diplomatic buildings. Increases diplomacy.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEminenceTech_Dec
StringTable.String: A civilization which takes diplomacy seriously and has a long record of fair-minded dealing will always carry a greater voice at the bargaining table. Our people are building that reputation now, and are stronger for it.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMajestyTech_Name
StringTable.String: Majesty

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMajestyTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the formation of assimilation treaties.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMajestyTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The galaxy wants to believe every word we say. So sterling is our reputation, that our diplomats often find whole worlds begging to join our culture. The pen hasn't just beaten the sword; it's humiliated it.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranUnitedPlanetsLobbyist_Name
StringTable.String: United Planets Lobbyist

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranUnitedPlanetsLobbyist_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks additional resolutions to be proposed.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranUnitedPlanetsLobbyist_Dec
StringTable.String: There's a shocking amount of backroom dealing which goes on behind the surface of the United Planets. But that's how the sausage is made, and we'll do well if we're better at it than our enemies. And our allies.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranUnitedPlanetsClout_Name
StringTable.String: United Planets Clout

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranUnitedPlanetsClout_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks more powerful resolutions to be proposed.
