StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranUnitedPlanetsClout_Dec
StringTable.String: Our allies have long been convinced of the benefits of our friendship. Now they see the benefit of our wisdom and leadership. We can now rely on their unwavering support on all United Planets matters.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCulturalInfluence_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Influence

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCulturalInfluence_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of basic cultural buildings. Increases influence.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCulturalInfluence_Dec
StringTable.String: A strong cultural presence, on our worlds and our neighbors' has tremendous long term potential. It lacks some of the visceral appeal of a new type of mass driver, but may in the long run be far more effective at securing humanity's future.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCulturalOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Passionate Representation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCulturalOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases influence.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCulturalOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that our culture has made inroads on the planets of our neighbors, we can help cement this influence by encouraging our biggest stars to regularly visit and vacation there, serving as ambassadors for our way of life.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCulturalOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Efficient Representation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCulturalOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of cultural buildings.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCulturalOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Although artists and designers aren't naturally inclined towards thinking about money, after we locked a few of them in a room with an accountant for a bit, they managed to find a number of ways they could do their work more efficiently.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCulturalOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Self Sufficient Representation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCulturalOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the maintenance costs of cultural buildings.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCulturalOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Our cultural facilities cost real money to maintain. By encouraging our artists and directors to reuse materials, props, and punch lines whenever possible, we can reduce the ongoing costs of running these enterprises.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCulturalOutreach_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Outreach

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCulturalOutreach_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of improved cultural buildings. Increases influence.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCulturalOutreach_Dec
StringTable.String: By building facilities that focus on spreading our cultural accomplishments amongst our civilians and neighbors, we expect to see even more influence in this region of space, or at the very least, more awards from the artistic community.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCulturalFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Research-Focused Culture

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCulturalFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases influence on research planets.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCulturalFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: By adapting our cultural products to cast scientists and researchers in a more favorable light, we might find appreciative audiences among research communities.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCulturalFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Approval-Focused Culture

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCulturalFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases influence on planets with high approval.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCulturalFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: A culture which focuses on its leaders is a fine thing to have when those leaders are doing a good job. When the leaders aren't doing a good job, it's filled with harsh satire and unflattering impressions, so watch out for that.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCulturalFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Wealth-Focused Culture

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCulturalFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases influence on wealthy planets.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCulturalFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: If people have money, let's not make them ashamed of it. By encouraging displays of conspicuous consumption and a culture which celebrates wealth, we can gain a great deal of influence with people living the good life.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranStellarEmigration_Name
StringTable.String: Stellar Emigration

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranStellarEmigration_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of advanced cultural buildings. Increases influence.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranStellarEmigration_Dec
StringTable.String: Humans are admired throughout the galaxy, reflecting the success of our civilization. If we can make the process of emigration easier, we can spread our influence wider still.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCulturalAssimilation_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Assimilation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCulturalAssimilation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of exotic cultural buildings. Increases influence.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCulturalAssimilation_Dec
StringTable.String: Foreign cultures have such backwards ideas that we'll find great value in quickly assimilating and removing the cultural trappings of new arrivals. By doing so we can increase the penetration and acceptance of our culture more.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCulturalDomination_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Domination

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCulturalDomination_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate cultural buildings. Increases influence.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCulturalDomination_Dec
StringTable.String: There is no other culture in the galaxy but ours, and anyone who claims otherwise is a heretic. Or just dumb. All sane beings will soon bow down before our celebrities and thinkers.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCulturalAffinity_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Affinity

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCulturalAffinity_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Prepares the civilization for Ascension.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCulturalAffinity_Dec
StringTable.String: Other universes deserve the benefit of humanity's wisdom and culture. Indeed, it's a bit offensive that they don't see it already. Our thinkers are now beginning to prepare plans for shining our light on the next world, and beyond.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranXenoCommerce_Name
StringTable.String: Xeno Commerce

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranXenoCommerce_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of basic economic buildings. Adds a trade route.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranXenoCommerce_Dec
StringTable.String: An economy which spans the stars is a pretty complicated beast. We don't need to understand it all, of course, just supply the facilities and light regulations for the free market to get to work doing what it does best.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCommerceSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Wealthy Population

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCommerceSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases wealth.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCommerceSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: With targeted tax rates, we can encourage a number of different areas of our economy. A tax policy which favors business and investment should ultimately lead to a wealthier economy, for example. Unless the businesses and investors were lying to us.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCommerceSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Supportive Population

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCommerceSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases approval.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCommerceSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: By targeting economic policy to support workers and the civilian population in general, we can ensure we have a much broader base of approval to build our civilization on.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCommerceSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Designated Trading Partner

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCommerceSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Adds a trade route.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCommerceSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Encouraging and supporting trade is a great way to both bring in extra income and forge closer ties with our neighbors. Everyone's happy when they're making money.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranXenoEconomics_Name
StringTable.String: Xeno Economics

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranXenoEconomics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of improved economic buildings.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranXenoEconomics_Dec
StringTable.String: The sheer distance between buyers and sellers in this economy has resulted in us having to rewrite a number of different theories of economics. At minimum, some new banking and economic structures will be required to deal with all the complications.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInterstellarBanking_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Banking

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInterstellarBanking_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of advanced economic buildings.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInterstellarBanking_Dec
StringTable.String: Capital can now be transferred instantaneously. This has allowed a variety of creative arbitrage opportunities, which will require new regulations and banking theory to contain.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEconomicFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Trade Economy

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEconomicFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases trade route income.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEconomicFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: An economy which prioritizes external trading will be well suited to exploit the wealth of the greater galactic community, or just exploit the greater galactic community in general.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEconomicFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Well Crafted Treaties

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEconomicFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases diplomatic trade income.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEconomicFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: There is a certain art in the framing of a treaty, and even in an agreement between equals, one party can be more equal than the other. Let's be that more equal party.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEconomicFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Tourism Board

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEconomicFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases tourism income.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEconomicFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: By reducing the obstacles that foreign tourists might face when trying to visit us, we can encourage more of them to travel here and more of their money to stay here.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranFinancialSectorsTech_Name
StringTable.String: Financial Sectors

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranFinancialSectorsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of exotic economic buildings.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranFinancialSectorsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Dedicated financial sectors should help facilitate the flow of capital across our civilization, which will result in more things being built in the places they need to. Wealth creation, in other words, which we can tap for a variety of purposes.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranGalacticStockMarket_Name
StringTable.String: Galactic Stock Market

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranGalacticStockMarket_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of the ultimate economic buildings.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranGalacticStockMarket_Dec
StringTable.String: Stock exchanges have proven remarkably elusive to establish in this galaxy, and only the most recent advances in communications technology and regulatory capability have made them possible.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInterstellarTrade_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Trade

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInterstellarTrade_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of basic trading buildings. Adds two trade routes.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInterstellarTrade_Dec
StringTable.String: Exchanging goods with our neighbors will theoretically enrich us both, and is worth pursuing for that reason alone. Also, if we play it smart, it can enrich us a lot more than the other guy.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTradeOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Trade Route Optimization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTradeOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the overall value of trade routes.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTradeOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: By optimizing both the outgoing and receiving ends of our trade routes we have been able to achieve a modest overall profit for everyone involved.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTradeOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Expanded Trade

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTradeOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the establishment of one additional trade route.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTradeOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: We believe the best way to increase trade income is to establish more trade routes. With a bit of effort we have been able to stretch our resources enough to establish one more.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranGalacticTrade_Name
StringTable.String: Galactic Trade

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranGalacticTrade_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of improved trading buildings. Adds two trade routes.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranGalacticTrade_Dec
StringTable.String: By establishing fixed trading hubs and encouraging the markets which develop around them, the wealth of the entire galactic community will flow through our hands. Our ever so slightly sticky hands.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTradeFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Tariff Stations

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTradeFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: All starbases now give a significant boost to the trade income of colonies with their area of effect.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTradeFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: By establishing a tariff station on our starbases we have been able to increase our cut of trade route profits.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTradeFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Trade Route Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTradeFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the establishment of one additional trade route.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTradeFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: More trade routes means more trade income. Sometimes it's best to stick to the basics.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranGalacticFacilitation_Name
StringTable.String: Galactic Facilitation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranGalacticFacilitation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of advanced trading buildings. Adds two trade routes.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranGalacticFacilitation_Dec
StringTable.String: The sheer volume of goods that pass through a trading port is staggering; we'll need new facilities to manage the flow of goods smoothly and safely. We've had a few too many large masses make dock workers very, very flat.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTradeMasters_Name
StringTable.String: Trade Masters

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTradeMasters_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of exotic trading buildings. Adds two trade routes.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTradeMasters_Dec
StringTable.String: Our civilization is synonymous with wealth and trading, and all intelligent beings know our markets are the best - really, the only place to buy and sell goods. Of course, certain advantages accrue to the owner of such a monopoly.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranXenoEntertainment_Name
StringTable.String: Xeno Entertainment

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranXenoEntertainment_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of basic entertainment buildings. Increases approval.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranXenoEntertainment_Dec
StringTable.String: Without the approval of our people, we won't be able to accomplish very much. Distracting them with various amusements is perhaps a cynical ploy, but it might be easier than trying to treat them as the rational beings they're so often not.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInterstellarTourism_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Tourism

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInterstellarTourism_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved entertainment buildings. Begin collecting tourism income.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInterstellarTourism_Dec
StringTable.String: Not only can we entertain and distract our own citizens with amusements, we can begin luring friendly visitors from our galactic neighbors. This will help improve relations, and at minimum, result in some extra income for us.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPopulationDiversion_Name
StringTable.String: Population Diversion

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPopulationDiversion_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of advanced entertainment buildings.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPopulationDiversion_Dec
StringTable.String: More amusements! Bigger amusements! Human beings are dreadfully simple sometimes, which is distressing on some level, even if it does make them pretty easy to manage.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranApprovalFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Easy to Please

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranApprovalFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the morale of your colonies.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranApprovalFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: We have discovered that we can make people feel more confident and happy: With proper messaging, we can keep our citizens happy without all that costly infrastructure.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranApprovalFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Easily Distracted

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranApprovalFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes building entertainment improvements much cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranApprovalFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: We have discovered that our efforts in keeping our people distracted have paid off. We can now build anything and they will think it is fun.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranApprovalFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Eager to Please

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranApprovalFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Greatly reduces the maintenance required by entertainment improvements.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranApprovalFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Not only are our people easier to please, they will now do most of the work it takes to distract themselves, for free.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSuperiorRecreation_Name
StringTable.String: Superior Recreation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSuperiorRecreation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of exotic entertainment buildings.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSuperiorRecreation_Dec
StringTable.String: Zero gravity beaches are a tough concept to wrap your head around, and even tougher to build. But that hasn't stopped them from becoming insanely popular, even if they do get in the hair and teeth a lot more than the regular kind.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranContentmentTech_Name
StringTable.String: Contentment

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranContentmentTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of the ultimate entertainment buildings.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranContentmentTech_Dec
StringTable.String: It turns out the answer we were looking for this whole time was simply injecting happiness into the base of the skull. Virtual worlds offer anything a person could desire at a fraction of the cost of actually giving it to them.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranGalacticCruseLines_Name
StringTable.String: Galactic Cruise Lines

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranGalacticCruseLines_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of tourism structures. Increases tourism income.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranGalacticCruseLines_Dec
StringTable.String: Space is, for people not involved with day-to-day civilization building, incredibly boring. And it's still a bit deadly. But if we were to spruce it up a bit, there might be some profit in sending tourists there.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWondersoftheGalaxy_Name
StringTable.String: Wonders of the Galaxy

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWondersoftheGalaxy_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of advanced tourism structures. Increases tourism income.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWondersoftheGalaxy_Dec
StringTable.String: The galactic community is beginning to realize just how awesome we are, and if they aren't, we'll soon be airing targeted advertisements which tell them to. The expected increase in tourism revenue is anticipated to be very nice indeed.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPilgrimageTech_Name
StringTable.String: Pilgrimage

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPilgrimageTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of exotic tourism structures. Increases tourism income.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPilgrimageTech_Dec
StringTable.String: There's not a single being in this galaxy that doesn't want to make a visit to human space. For many of them, it's a religious requirement. Our home has become the most important destination that intelligent life has ever known.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIndustrialSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Industrial Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIndustrialSpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves colonial buildings.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIndustrialSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: It only took a few horrific accidents for us to finally come to grips with the challenges of off-world industry, and now that we have, we've identified a number of ways we can begin improving and specializing our industrial capacity.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranConstructionOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Construction Optimization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranConstructionOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves manufacturing buildings.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranConstructionOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Seemingly small improvements can have a big effect when applied to large projects, and we're working on some very large projects now indeed.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranManufacturingFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Manufacturing Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranManufacturingFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves manufacturing buildings.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranManufacturingFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: There's no getting around it: "Incremental improvements in manufacturing techniques" isn't much of a headline. Which is a shame, considering the benefit we expect to see from them.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIndustrialMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Industrial Mastery

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIndustrialMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves manufacturing buildings.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIndustrialMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: If it can be dreamed up, we can build it. Indeed, many of our economists now believe that the limiting factor of our industrial capacity is our own imaginations.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranResearchOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Research Optimization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranResearchOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves research buildings.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranResearchOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Researchers are great at inventing things, but surprisingly bad at the business of inventing things. A number of inefficient research practices have developed which we really need to improve upon.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTechnologicalFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Technological Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTechnologicalFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves research buildings.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTechnologicalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: The lab equipment needed to research some of these new fields is incredibly expensive and esoteric. Specializing our research efforts may be necessary to make the most rapid advances.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPlanetarySpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Planetary Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPlanetarySpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves farms.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPlanetarySpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: We've made great strides with our colonization techniques in the past few years, and can now begin considering specific areas we'd like to improve upon.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAgriculturalOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Agricultural Optimization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAgriculturalOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves farms.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAgriculturalOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Optimizing our farming processes will lead to a number of benefits which will help our civilization for a very long time. Until people stop needing food, really.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranFarmingFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Farming Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranFarmingFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves farms.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranFarmingFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Although all this attention we pay to improving our farming techniques sometimes make our farmers uncomfortable - they do get set in their ways - the improvements to our food production capacity are too great to ignore.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAgriculturalMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Agricultural Mastery

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAgriculturalMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves farms.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAgriculturalMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our farms now provide an almost unlimited bounty, the food doing much of the hard work itself. Admittedly, the first time you see a plant or animal self-harvest is a little grim, and school field trips have certainly gotten a lot harder.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEnvironmentOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Environment Optimization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEnvironmentOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves terrain effects.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEnvironmentOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: We've reached the stage where we can optimize our program of environmental modifications to suit specific civil programs. Good news for us, although we have yet to ask the environment how it feels about this.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranColonizationFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Colonization Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranColonizationFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves potential of extreme worlds.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranColonizationFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Mastering living on an extreme world will make life there a lot more tolerable for the poor fools who volunteered for it.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBiospherePerfection_Name
StringTable.String: Biosphere Perfection

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBiospherePerfection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves potential of Extreme worlds.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBiospherePerfection_Dec
StringTable.String: No longer must our colonists suffer in their own homes. Even the deadliest of planets are now perfectly survivable to us.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInterstellarSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInterstellarSpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves ship systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInterstellarSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we have a bit of experience sending ships out into the darkness and having most of them come back, we've come up with a number of ways to improve our equipment and navigational techniques.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIonOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Ion Optimization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIonOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves drives.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranIonOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we've seen them in widescale use, we've identified a number of ways we can make our new Ion Drive systems more efficient.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWarpFieldFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Warp Field Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWarpFieldFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves drives.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWarpFieldFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Warp field technology is incredibly complicated, and has in more than a few cases caused a researcher's brains to melt a little bit. But now that we have some experience working with them, we've identified a number of ways to improve their design.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHyperwarpMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Hyperwarp Mastery

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHyperwarpMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves drives.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHyperwarpMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our ships are the envy of the galaxy and our engineers heralded as heroes wherever they go. Fortunately they don't like going out much.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSensorOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Sensor Optimization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSensorOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves sensors.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSensorOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: A concentrated effort to optimize our sensor systems could lead to a number of different improvements or efficiencies.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEnergyFieldFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Energy Field Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEnergyFieldFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves sensors.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEnergyFieldFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: As is usually the case when equipment is sent to the field, the technicians who actually use our sensors soon came up with a number of different ways to improve their efficiency and effectiveness.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSensorMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Sensor Mastery

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSensorMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves sensors.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSensorMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: We don't anticipate any further increases in the viewing range of our sensors, not until we leave this universe for another one. But we can certainly make them a little more efficient.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPrecursorRelicFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Relic Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPrecursorRelicFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves Precursor relic benefits.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPrecursorRelicFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Having captured a few Precursor relics and observed the impact they have on our research and culture, we can now try adjusting our Precursor studies to benefit specific areas of our civilization.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLifeSupportOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Life Support Optimization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLifeSupportOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves life support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLifeSupportOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Everyone in the navy is very excited that we're trying to optimize our life support systems, and would certainly cheer if they weren't conserving their air.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSupportFieldFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Support Field Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSupportFieldFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves life support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranSupportFieldFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our early attempts at building field-based life support systems left behind many messes and many possible opportunities for improvement, which we're starting to identify now. Cleaning up the messes: that was the obvious one.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLifeSupportMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Life Support Mastery

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLifeSupportMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves life support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLifeSupportMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: We have all but mastered direct-nutrient injection technologies, and now have left but a few additional efficiencies to wring out of these systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranOrbitalSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Orbital Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranOrbitalSpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves logistics.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranOrbitalSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we've watched a few construction projects accidentally collapse on themselves, we've identified a number of possible improvements we can make to our orbital construction techniques.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranZeroGravityOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Zero Gravity Optimization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranZeroGravityOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves hulls.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranZeroGravityOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: We took a big step forward with our most recent adoption of true zero-gravity construction practices. Now, after a few trial runs and one teensy little accident, our engineers have identified further areas for improvement.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranOrbitalConstructionFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Orbital Construction Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranOrbitalConstructionFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves hulls.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranOrbitalConstructionFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: We're getting better and better at large scale construction with every passing day, and a number of more efficient design practices are beginning to show up on our engineers' drawing tables. Along with the offensive doodles which have always been there.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHullMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Hull Mastery

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHullMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves hulls.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHullMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: We're still finding ways to improve our shipyards, even though they're already the envy of the civilized galaxy. In the uncivilized galaxy they're a bit less envied, but we've never gotten along with those guys anyways.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCarrierFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Carrier Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCarrierFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves carriers.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCarrierFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: There's nothing like doing something a few times to see how terrible you are at it. After a few hilarious mishaps, we've identified a few ways we can improve our carrier operations.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLogisticalOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Logistical Optimization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLogisticalOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves logistics.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranLogisticalOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: A new generation of space accountants are becoming trained as we speak, capable of improving logistical efficiencies most people would be too bored to ever notice.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWeaponsSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Weapons Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWeaponsSpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves weapon systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWeaponsSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: By dedicating their efforts on a specific field of weapons technology, our researchers believe they can deliver a number of more efficient weapon systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBeamWeaponOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Weapon Optimization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBeamWeaponOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBeamWeaponOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Weapons researchers have to keep pace with advances in many other fields to get the most out of their inventions. Right now, recent advances in material sciences are opening the door to a new generation of more efficient weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHighEnergyFocus_Name
StringTable.String: High Energy Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHighEnergyFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranHighEnergyFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: A careful analysis of data returned from the field has revealed a number of inefficiencies which we can begin addressing in the next generation of our beam systems. We may also finally be able to get rid of that funny smell they make.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBeamWeaponMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Weapon Mastery

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBeamWeaponMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBeamWeaponMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our beam weapons are now absurdly powerful, a terror for anyone foolish enough to get on humanity's wrong side. And yet still our weapon scientists find ways to do better.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMissileOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Missile Optimization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMissileOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMissileOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: After blowing up several thousand target drones and one unfortunate asteroid, our weapons engineers have come up with a number of possible improvements we can implement for our missile platforms.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWarheadFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Warhead Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWarheadFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranWarheadFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: We've spent comparatively little research time on the warhead components of our missile systems, but now that we've turned our attention to the matter, a number of possible efficiencies should be achievable with a little effort.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPayloadMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Payload Mastery

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPayloadMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPayloadMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Various physical limits of this particular universe prevent us from wringing more destructive potential out of this generation of warheads. But we can certainly make them cheaper and lighter.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranKineticOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Optimization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranKineticOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranKineticOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Some modest improvements in the energy delivery systems of our kinetic weapons could result in improvements to the cost, mass, or range of each unit.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranKineticAccelerationFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Acceleration Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranKineticAccelerationFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranKineticAccelerationFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Recent advances in superconducting technology should lead to improvements in the critical energy delivery systems of our kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranKineticMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Mastery

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranKineticMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranKineticMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: After several generations of whipping things at other things as fast as possible, our scientists are now really quite good at it. There remain but a few small efficiencies to wring out of the field.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMilitarySpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Military Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMilitarySpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves military effectiveness.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranMilitarySpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Oversight is certainly the least glamorous aspect of keeping a standing army, which is sad considering the benefit it provides. Improving our military administration will result in very real tactical benefits.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInvasionOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Invasion Optimization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInvasionOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks advanced invasion tactics.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranInvasionOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Good news! We've developed some new, possibly amoral, certainly effective techniques for pacifying enemy ground forces.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranGravitationalFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Gravitational Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranGravitationalFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks advanced invasion tactics.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranGravitationalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our ability to manipulate gravitational fields presents several unique tactical possibilities for our ground forces. These are powerful weapons we're giving to guys with pretty thick skulls, so we should definitely remember to keep an eye on them.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDefensiveFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Defensive Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDefensiveFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks advanced invasion defenses.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDefensiveFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our military theoreticians have analyzed reports of the latest invasion tactics in use in the galaxy and come up with a number of elegant ways to counter them.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDefensiveSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Defensive Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDefensiveSpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves defensive systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDefensiveSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: After studying the wreckage of a few vessels we've lost in combat, our engineers have come up with a number of possible improvements we can make to our defensive technologies.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranShieldOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Optimization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranShieldOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves shield systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranShieldOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: We've received quite a bit of useful data on real world performance of our shield systems, and have devised several possible improvements we can begin making to them.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBarrierSystemFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Barrier System Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBarrierSystemFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves shield systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranBarrierSystemFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: A careful design review of our initial implementation of the Barrier Field system has revealed a number of possible avenues for further improvements. Who says design reviews are unexciting?

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranShieldMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Mastery

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranShieldMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves shield systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranShieldMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our shielding technology approaches perfection. Our engineers now push the capabilities of our shield systems right to their theoretical limits.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPointDefenseOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Point Defense Optimization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPointDefenseOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPointDefenseOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Optimizing our point defense systems should lead to a number of different performance gains. Like possibly less exploded ships.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCounterMeasureFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Counter Measure Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCounterMeasureFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCounterMeasureFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we have some field data on ECM suite performance, we've identified a number of different ways we can improve upon the design and construction of those systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDroneSystemMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Drone System Mastery

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDroneSystemMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDroneSystemMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Drone systems dramatically increased the sheer volume of our point defense capabilities, so any small improvement in their design should lead to significant cost or weight savings.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArmorOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Optimization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArmorOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves armor systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArmorOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: We've blown up lots and lots of slabs of armor on the test range, and have come up with a few possible improvements we could make to our armor systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArmorFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArmorFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves armor systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArmorFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our armor systems have increased significantly in complexity, and our efforts to model their behavior under impact is only now catching up. This research should help lead to more effective or efficient designs.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArmorMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Mastery

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArmorMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves armor systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranArmorMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our mastery of hardening techniques is almost complete and the galaxy trembles at the girth of our vessels. But even perfection can be improved upon it seems. Some more effort should lead to cheaper or more efficient armor systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDiplomaticSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Diplomatic Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDiplomaticSpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves diplomatic effects.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDiplomaticSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: The words we use have a limited ability to affect the way we think, and by studying the vocabulary used by our neighbors, we may unlock valuable insights into their mindsets. And possibly even find out how to manipulate them.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPoliticalSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Political Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPoliticalSpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks political parties.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPoliticalSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: There are several broad ways to organize a government for a space-faring civilization, all of which pose distinct advantages and disadvantages. Rest assured, there's no right choice here; regardless of what you pick, everyone will tell you that you made the wrong choice.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPoliticalFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Political Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPoliticalFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks political parties.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPoliticalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: As we continue to manage (and often mismanage) our affairs, it's become clear that a number of political theories we'd never considered viable before might actually be very relevant indeed when practiced on a galactic scale.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPoliticalMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Political Mastery

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPoliticalMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks political parties.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranPoliticalMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Coordinating the direction of an entire galactic civilization is tremendously difficult. But thanks to advances in deceit and brain injection technology, we can now put this whole show entirely on a war footing, or, if we choose, the exact opposite.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDiplomaticOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Diplomatic Optimization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDiplomaticOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks advanced treaties.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranDiplomaticOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Depending on the current state of our civilization, we profit more from some types of treaties than others, and should begin slanting our diplomatic posture in those directions right away.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAllianceFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Alliance Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAllianceFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks advanced alliances.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranAllianceFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Alliances come in a variety of flavors, some of which may be more advantageous to us than others. We should consider our civilization's priorities - and what our new ally is actually good for - before entering such talks.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCulturalOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Optimization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCulturalOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves cultural buildings.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCulturalOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Although the artists responsible for our cultural delivery vehicles like the extra funding we shovel in their direction, few appreciate the suggestion that they could possibly do things more efficiently. They can though. A lot.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCulturalFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCulturalFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases influence on specific worlds.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCulturalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Few works of art and cultural artifacts have broad appeal, and it's often necessary to target one's audience to some extent. By fine tuning the tone and content of our cultural products, we might appeal to demographics which are particularly valuable to us.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCommerceSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Commerce Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCommerceSpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases economic benefits.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranCommerceSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: With a bit of experience managing and regulating markets on a massive scale, we're now able to target specific economic improvements we might like to see.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEconomicFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Economic Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEconomicFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases income.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranEconomicFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we have a better understanding of the quirks of galactic-scale economies, we can begin trimming back the regulations and policies that seem to be causing inefficiencies in specific industries and areas.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTradeOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Trade Optimization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTradeOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases trade income.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTradeOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Trading has long been as much an art as a science. By inducing our traders to use just a smidge more science, they might be able to maximize their profits when dealing with certain sectors.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTradeFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Trade Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTradeFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks advanced trade routes.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranTradeFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we have a reputation as fair dealers and market makers, it should be possible to target our trading activities to encourage specific economic sectors.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranApprovalFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Approval Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranApprovalFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases approval on specific planets.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_TerranApprovalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our cultural engineers inform us that some well planned manipulations of our cultural materials could make our people happier with what they already have. Which seems too good of an opportunity to pass up.
